name: Maschinen Dolls
description: Join Wyverniah and her Mythroid Doll friends, fighting Monstroid on 2.5D side scrolling battlefield and explore the world as tiny cute toys. Customize your favorite Mythoroid according to your taste, show your styles and utilize the cool and powerful arsenals in battle to save the world !

name: Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo Kokuu no Houteishiki
description: Zettai Zetsumei Shoujo Kokuu no Houteishiki is an adventure indie game.

name: The Prospector Odyssey
description: A lonely trek to a desolate planet unearths a strange anomaly, seemingly causing denizens of a nearby station to become horrifying, violent mutants. Run, think, scavenge and improvise. Only the smartest will survive.

name: Retro Revengers
description: A retro-style adventure platformer game, inspired by hits of the past and featuring wonderful music created by Manami Matsumae, will take you on an eventful journey through the diverse environmental stages to encourage you to save the world of retro gaming.

name: Puzzillion
description: A logic puzzles 3D first person game. Move things around, toggle switches, open doors, blend colors - train your brain solving challenge after challenge. Includes classic puzzles and new puzzles, physics and logic, light and electricity, twists and surprises.

name: Fate and Judgement
description: Fate and Judgement is a vertical shoot'em up with roguelike elements and procedural stage generation. Fight Through hordes of an empire you once served and relieve your last mission until victory is yours!

name: Prison Colony: A Convict's Tale
description: Fight enemy vehicles on a procedurally generated, foreign world in this 3D Mecha game. Build better vehicles until you can afford your own spacejet, and escape the prison colony using that spacejet. Defend your base from enemy attack or pick the next mission to play.

name: Nano Citizens
description: Nano Citizens, the city-building game that takes simulation to new heights! Dive into a world where you have the power to micro-manage every aspect of your metropolis. Influence the lives of virtual citizens, shaping their careers, and witnessing the profound impact of your decisions.

name: Etaine: Magic Survivor
description: Etaine: Magic Survivor is a top-down arena shooter survival roguelite game. You can eliminate thousands of enemies through magic or artifacts. You can also choose talents to shape different builds to strengthen yourself. Will you be able to survive when you against the thousands of monsters？

name: This is a Small Town
description: A trainee police officer arrives in a strange small town, but unexpectedly falls into a conspiracy. What happens during the process of investigating the truth?

name: Frogreign
description: Leap into Frogreign! Set forth as Rill, an exiled prince traversing the wild depths of their kingdom as they unravel a royal conspiracy. Master your agility, sword, and sticky tongue to defeat wild beasts and explore ancient dungeons in this swashbuckling, amphibious action-adventure!

name: Bird Watching Simulator
description: An avid bird watching simulator with realistic watching mechanics. Grab your binoculars and build your attention span, Bird Watching Simulator is an unbelievably relaxing and interactive game that draws you so close to nature, it feels like you're apart of it.

name: A Creature's Journey
description: A peculiar creature finds themself alone with no memory of their past and a strong desire to find purpose for the future. After embarking on a journey to seek out answers with the aid of a mysterious traveler, hope turns to fear when an uncovered secret threatens the world.

name: Roanoke
description: Uncover the dark secrets of the lost colony in this gripping action-adventure/survival horror game. Step into the shoes of a desperate survivor trapped on Roanoke Island, where the boundaries between history and the supernatural blur. Beware the lurking horrors that lie within the shadows.

name: Bellboy Boris
description: Bellboy Boris is a 2D platformer where you have to collect luggages and delivery them to specific and randomly defined rooms as fast as you can.

name: RV Kingdom 0x0297
description: Save the world from the upcoming demon invasion or join the evil forces! Gather a party of gangsters and kick ass! Explore the world within three years and prepare for the great battle that will change the history forever!

name: Will.exe
description: Will.exe, a game whose character no longer wants to be played. Not anymore.

name: Plant Therapy
description: An unapologetically cozy plant collecting and decorating game. Build a beautiful indoor garden from the ground up in your New York City apartment.

name: Harma
description: Harma began with the belief of humans overcoming hardships. We have created an immensely challenging strategic card game that befits this theme. If you are someone who doesn't shy away from life's trials and faces them head-on, this game is for you.

name: Sex with the Devil 2
description: The dwarfs from hell broke loose, the pursuit of the sinful soul began. They will torment her, enjoying the fading hope...

name: Jank Cube VR
description: Jank Cube is a fun VR physics sandbox filled to the brim with cool unique objects for you to interact with using the fully physically simulated player rig in maps made from the ground up for VR.

name: Vortix
description: What do you get when you combine marbles with a battle royale ring and PvP? Vortix! Vortix is an online competitive game where the objective is to knock your opponent or opponents out of the shrinking ring!

name: Thief Simulator: Shopping Center
description: To access this content you need to have the game Thief Simulator on Steam.

name: Molt
description: Molt is a turn-based deckbuilding card game in the vein of Hearthstone, Dominion and Wingspan. It aims to be educational and fun, with realistic depictions of snake species.

name: Slingshot Protocol
description: Slingshot Protocol is a fast-paced retro first-person shooter with intense combat, large arsenal of weapons and agile source-based movement. Navigate a variety of levels, from sci-fi facilities to a desolate and violent alien world. Fighting against fast and highly aggressive enemies.

name: GameDev Trash
description: GameDevTrash is a highly unconventional game.Each level presents a new genre for you to experience: shooter, open-world RPG, horror,and much more! The game's plot revolves around the modern gaming industry and its peculiarities. All of this is mixed with a slightly insane storyline and trashy humor.

name: War of Being
description: War of Being is a single-player VR sci-fi adventure with standard mode playability, based on the music and concept for TesseracT's 2023 full length album. Explore 'The Strangeland' filled with surreal landscapes and characters. Solve puzzles and find hidden objects that unlock TesseracT's new music.

name: Faster
description: Faster is a high-speed running game where only one winner survives. Race against other runners on a futuristic track set in a surreal city. Knock your opponents off the track and do whatever it takes to stay ahead. It’s parkour meets hardcore, runner vs. runner. Are you faster? It's time to prove it

name: Closing Time
description: A first person psychological horror game with a heavy focus on a rich story with hidden secrets to uncover. Take control on the night of a burglary of a superstore. Navigate puzzles and evade and hide from the horrors as you desperately try to escape with your life.

name: Deckweaver: Descent Into Chaos
description: Deckweaver: Descent into Chaos is a first person deckbuilding game where the player crafts their abilities using different cards they find in the environment. Obliterate forces of chaos, fighting through corrupt locations in the world before getting the chance to face and defeat Chaos itself.

name: The Blue Stars
description: The Blue Stars is a strategy RPG where you can bond with weird alien party members. It features simple yet deep strategy combat and a lot of characters and enemies.

name: Escape from Russia: Mobilization Madness
description: You have received a summons to the military enlistment office, and there is only one way out - to run. In Kazakhstan, Upper Lars, try to fly somewhere or look for salvation in grandpa's bunker, the main thing is to have time to run out of the apartment before the public services page loads

name: Tales of Mist
description: Tales of Mist is a survival game integrating strategy and adventure in a decaying world. Plagued by the presence of witches and the tyranny of creatures straight out of fairy tales, take command of a city to bring light to this fog-filled world.

name: Isle of Maligree
description: Become an investigator in a dark fantasy story. People keep going missing in Maligree, before being forgotten by all who knew them. Will you solve the case before you forget?

name: National Park Girls: Episode 5 - Eternal Evergreen Part 2
description: National Park Girls: Episode 5 - Eternal Evergreen Part 2 is the final installment in the episodic visual novel National Park Girls.

name: Rage of Mechs
description: Experience intense mech battles in the post-apocalyptic wasteland of Rage of Mechs. Command powerful mechs, upgrade weapons, and strategize in multiplayer sessions. Unleash your rage and conquer the wasteland!

name: Disruptive
description: Immerse yourself in a first-person sci-fi horror experience, trapped in a desolate laboratory. Explore its dark corridors, unveil its horrors and find your way to survival, as you are stalked by atrocious threats. Question yourself, make decisions and discover your destiny.

name: The Lancaster Leak: Crisis at Call Center
description: Another tape has been leaked, this time a cover-up of a tragic mass casualty event.

name: Handmancers
description: Handmancers is a first-person roguelike deckbuilder set in a crazy fantasy world where warriors solve their problems through the power of their hands… literally.

name: Ekans
description: Experience the classic Snake game with a twist! You're the fruit, and your mission is to escape the snake. Outsmart your opponents, climb the leaderboard, and face the thrilling challenge!

name: Kart Life
description: Download now and start your quest for karting glory!

name: Maze of Fear
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure through mysterious worlds, conquering obstacles and unraveling intriguing puzzles. Immerse yourself in minimalist graphics and uncover secrets in this unique gaming experience. Get ready for surprises!

name: GoSickRogue
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat at Home
description: This is a 2D side-scrolling puzzle game with a cat as the main character. The game takes place in a villa, where you play as a cat that has just entered the house. You meet animals with different personalities, solve one problem after another, and finally resolve the crisis at home.

name: Orbit Zero
description: Create a Company, Build structures, Collect Resources, Make Investments and Speculate on Assets. Carefully manage your Workforce, Finances, Resources, Shareholders, BOD & Political Partnerships.

name: Skeler Boy
description: Experience a nostalgic aesthetic right out of 1970s and 1980s cultural classics, with adventure gameplay and a dark and disturbing narrative!

name: The Jusou
description: "The Jusou series", renowned as the most terrifying horror escape game in the history of smartphones, is now available on Steam! Many players have abandoned their games due to the sheer terror it instills! *Please play at your own risk if you experience any unusual phenomena after playing this game.

name: Jamboy: A Jelly-cious Hero
description: Jamboy and Billy need to get out of a giant’s belly, who’s swallowed them! Explore a fleshy laberynth, in this crazy action-platformer, while defeating dangerous food monsters and finding a way out! Do you have the guts to do it?

name: Cult of the Call
description: Cult of the Call is an Action RPG game with RTS elements where you summon and command minions. You take the role of a cult summoner and necromancer, customizing an elemental deck of cards to build an army of units while gaining the favors of the Old Gods.

name: Tetrocombat
description: Tetrocombat is a sci-fi, falling block, roguelike. Select your hexmaster and battle the mighty protojinz by combining falling "tetroes" infused with powerful hexes into lines to deal damage. Upgrade your hexmaster with unique effects to radically enhance your strategy and defeat the protojinz.

name: Steel Division 2: Men of Steel
description: The fighting men of World War II take center stage in Steel Division 2: Men of Steel. In this major new expansion 8 new divisions, new nations including Bulgaria, dozens of new units, 2 new Aces, and new Unit Traits will lead you to victory on the battlefield.

name: Lost Oath
description: A Souls-like platformer with Roguelike elements.

name: Kingdom Simulator
description: Build, rule, and conquer in this immersive Kingdom Simulator. Shape your medieval realm, manage resources, navigate challenges, and strategize for the prosperity of your kingdom. Will you be a benevolent monarch or a cunning conqueror?

name: Flying Tank
description: Get into your Flying Tank and shoot 'em up like it's the good old days! Kill strange bosses, drop bombs from above and build an arsenal of fun, powerful weapons. Reclaim the stolen Earth - alone or with a friend - in a rich action-packed side-scrolling shmup!

name: The Rush
description: The Rush is a horizontally scrolling shoot 'em up with graphics inspired by classic space shooters of the MSX. Buckle up and see if you have what it takes to master the highly adaptive Chameleon Quartz space fighter, single-handedly obliterate the alien invaders, and overcome The Rush!

name: Alien Land
description: This is a special simulation tower defense game, where you need to command each citizen to build a base. To produce food, one also needs to resist monsters from the night!

name: Zombie Sanctuary: Ash
description: This is a fun 3D mowing magic battle game. Very decompression, press a few keys, move the mouse can feel a pleasant game experience.

name: Strike Force 3
description: Join Strike Force 3, an elite unit combating ruthless terrorists. Engage in adrenaline-pumping firefights, stealth missions, and complete daring objectives. Enlist now for the ultimate combat experience!

name: Parafron
description: Unravel dark secrets, confront inner demons, and shape the haunting narrative in this psychological thriller. Your choices define the gripping, first-person journey - will you unravel the truth or succumb to madness?

name: Ruthless:1
description: Ruthless:1 combines ARPG Hack and Slash with creature collection and puts it into a war-torn sci-fi world. Destroy enemy Mechs, grow your army and build the ultimate roster. Countless skills and items allow you to play the style you like.

name: Angular Velocity
description: Ultimate Frisbee in Spaaaacceee!!!!

name: Wirewalker
description: A first-person platform game with puzzle elements immersed in a mysterious realm of glittering wires. The player must explore and conquer the maps by exploiting resources, using logic, casting powers, facing entities and interacting with the environment.

name: Jezebel: Givin' Love a Shot
description: An old-school horizontal shoot 'em up, heavily inspired by the arcade classics of the 90's!

name: Hope of Bion
description: Hope of Bion is an adventure game with a lean towards story and atmosphere. Visit different locations, examine the objects of environment and fight enemies using weapons of melee and ranged combat.

name: Morigami
description: Enter the Japanese spirit realm while controling the young girl Mori and her origami companion simultaneously! On the quest to find Mori’s little sister, they need to combine their strengths and make use of the ability to change Origami into different forms with varying skills.

name: Terralora
description: Terralora is a simple Rogue-lite where you traverse a shattered world to overthrow a tyrannical kingdom. Take on the role of a chaotic little knight: Skye, as you explore procedurally generated zones filled with secrets, mysteries, and many untold treasures!

name: Package Runner
description: Your number is 22, a Package handler at Zenith Company. Your job is to fix those packages and keep your workspace tidy. Hot bath service is the only reward in this damn job. With work going on, you'll find the truth of the company.

name: Abandoning Spies
description: "Abandoning Spies" is an intense Metroidvania adventure. As Agent Pierce, navigate a complex world, master movement and gunplay, and unravel a deceptive underworld crime web. Inspired by characters Lazzy, Jasper, and Claire, will you uncover the truth?

name: Purrfect Survivors
description: Kill monsters, Gather paws, then you will be stronger and stronger! Purrfect Survivors is a roguelite game, which you need to get runes and arrange them against the thousands of monsters. Every rune has its own ability and it shows completely different ability depending on where you arrange it.

name: Expedition Wildlife
description: Step foot on a wondrous expedition! Explore Wildlife, an rich open world full of adventure. Help the inhabitants of Wildlife to restore its former glory. With a unique cartoony art style, immersive story, and challenging platform levels. Are you ready for the ultimate adventure?

name: Phobia Exposure VR
description: Phobia Exposure VR offers immersive exposure therapy in virtual reality. Conquer your fears with gradual levels of exposure, guided relaxation, and personal progress tracking. Overcome phobias at your own pace!

name: Hatone
description: Embark on an Action-Platformer with metroidvania elements odyssey as an Illuminati henchman. Navigate treacherous realms, battle fearsome bosses, overcome obstacles, and unravel secrets in an ancient castle. Fulfill your destiny, but beware: the Illuminati's intentions may not align with your own.

name: Rapis the Bullet
description: It is a Danmaku shooter ...... but the protagonist cannot shoot bullets. She only has a sword.

name: Vapor Up! With Man with Apple
description: Have you ever wanted to play a video game? Well, how about playing this one? Run and jump like a parkour master and save your dog from rats. You are robot from a vaporwave ghetto. Sounds cool, right?

name: Forbidden Tapes
description: Forbidden Tapes is a game consisting of three different horror stories. In the first episode, discover Jeremy Winterroad's recording, an urban exploration enthusiast searching for abandoned places full of stories. He won't be disappointed when he explores the old McNale house.

name: Football City
description: Manage your team in this voxel based football (soccer) management simulator. Make active decisions directly influencing the events in the match. Can you win the league?

name: The House on Ninth Avenue
description: Explore the house and surrounding garden to uncover clues and to find a way out.

name: Warlocks Deeds
description: Embark on an extraordinary journey through a mystical realm where warlocks and magic reign supreme. Introducing "Warlocks Deeds," a superbly crafted medieval survival sandbox voxel game that will transport you to a world of enchantment and adventure!

name: Veritus
description: Unshroud secrets hidden deep within the dark chambers of the god of shadow, Veritus’ castle. Persevere through monsters and mysteries lurking in every corner. Prepare to leave camp and journey into the castle’s lonely halls by collecting resources and equipment to make it out alive.

name: Rowtropia
description: Travel to the pixelated world of Rowtropia, engulfed by a mysterious infeсtion, explore its mysteries and save it from imminent destruction.

name: Magma Fever
description: "Magma Fever" is a 2D pixel-style mining action-adventure game. You will pilot a mech and dig into an underground volcanic world. Complete missions and confront enemies in various environment, overcome disasters like earthquakes and lava surges, bring back ores to upgrade your mech at the base.

name: DawnOfCombat
description: "DawnOfCombat" is an indie game I'm developing, due on Steam this year. Players navigate a vast universe, battling foes, modifying spaceships, and strategically upgrading with collected coins. Decisions shape each fresh challenge. The game beckons thrill-seekers towards cosmic glory and victory.

name: Culture House
description: Culture House is a nurturing + adventure game based on biological cultivation experiments. Set in a building influenced by 20th-century modernist houses, the game portrays serene and strange days, unravels the mysteries hidden behind the experiments, and culminates in the arrival of the apocalypse.

name: Gazolinas
description: Gazolinas is a competitive arcade racing game. Master precision driving, customize classic cars, and compete globally across diverse tracks. Enjoy realistic physics and dynamic environments in this thrilling race to the top.

name: Dungeon Crawl Tower Run
description: Single player 3D action roguelike extraction game. Create unique builds out of various combinations of skills and equipments to reach the 6th floor of the Tower!

name: Scrumlords
description: Fight off hordes of angry peasants and reclaim your realm in Scrumlords! Lead your formation of loyal soldiers into battle in this action-roguelite, unlocking new gear and increasing your abilities as you play.

name: Guns and Donuts
description: Donuts! and Guns!? Choose from a host of Donut! characters (each with multiple unique Guns!) and traverse wonderfully large locations in search for more Donut! companions. Fight through hordes of miscellaneous enemies by using either your Guns!, your Donuts!, or your puzzle solving skills!

name: Talented
description: Slay waves of spooky enemies for 20 nights to survive 'The Demonic Conveyor Belt'. Talented is an arcade roguelite with randomly generated skill trees. Choose your upgrades and abilities wisely and you might just make it out alive. Are you truly Talented?

name: Nightzoid
description: Nightzoid is a single-player, horror-puzzle indie game. Try to find out the mystery before death catches you.

name: Menyr
description: Create immersive worlds in seconds and play with friends in Menyr's storytelling engine. Generate dungeons, change biomes, and enjoy AAA graphics. Fully customizable, community-driven, and free, Menyr brings your TTRPG adventures to life in a seamless and immersive virtual tabletop experience.

name: The Backrooms Project
description: "The Backrooms Project" is an exciting solo/multiplayer horror game with infinite levels and lots of puzzles. Explore the almost endless levels alone or with friends, solve exciting puzzles, hide from monsters that won't shy away from killing you, try to escape.

name: SideQuest: Reanimated
description: SideQuest is a side-scrolling action RPG that takes you headfirst into a challenging adventure with a band of delightfully unconventional heroes. Play solo or with friends as you conquer quests, collect loot, craft devious custom builds, and press forward towards our heroes' inescapable destiny!

name: The City of Fury
description: The City of fury is a SWAT-like team management RTS set in a dystopian Cyberpunk-Noir setting, where you play as the team leader who gets involve in shady matters. Explore the themes of violence as you face the harsh city with your team to ultimately break free from the circle!

name: STSP: Super Titty Space Prison
description: STSP: Super Titty Space Prison is a fast fast-paced momentum based platformer with a high skill ceiling. Master bunny hopping, wall jumping, and slamming to defeat the prison and your friends!

name: Biosmose
description: To address the sterility of the world, a single seed can change everything. Blending contemplation and puzzle-solving, Biosmose is a game that invites you to revitalize depleted environments. Sow, discover, and learn to sustain various plants in this colorful universe.

name: Who Killed the Streamer?
description: Investigate the murder of a famous streamer and find out who the killer is, but beware of people who don't like you meddling.

name: Abysswalkers
description:
Abysswalkers is a competitive and tactical trading card game.

Being inspired by Tetramaster and Hearthstone, Abysswalkers has similarities to most popular games within the genre that players may be familiar with while also bringing a fun and interesting twist to the gameplay forcing players to strategize and think a little differently than they may be used to.

Set within the Grim Syndicate universe after it was marred by the Daemon Scourge, you will be able to open packs to collect different Daemon and Rune cards to build decks for your Grim Summoner to battle and compete with other Grims that have decided to explore the forbidden wonders of the Abyssal Plane.

Collect, Trade, and Battle to prove you are the greatest Abysswalker within the ETA.

name: Planet Valley
description: Overview: Manage resources and defend your base against alien attacks. Design: Build structures, collect resources and defend your colony with defense towers. Automation lets you focus on strategy.

name: A Date for the Ages
description: A Date for the Ages is a short, adult visual novel filled with humor, alternate endings, several animations, and CGs.

name: SoulQuest
description: Carve your path through hordes of enemies, defying the gods to seize the power of Morrigan, Goddess of Death, and retrieve the soul of your beloved! SoulQuest combines the evergreen Metroidvania gameplay with the unique Celtic mythology into one, action-packed mixture!

name: The Great Fear
description: Deep Fear will make you plunge into an atmosphere of horror and hopelessness. For salvation, you can only rely on yourself.

name: Battleship Lonewolf
description:
Flight through space, command your ship, and wage epic war in galaxy.
Five star space tower defense shooter!

name: Welcome to My Cave
description: Can you successfully manage a modern caveman tribe for 10 years? It’s time to prove yourself! Here’s your chance to lead a new caveman tribe and go even further in Welcome to My Cave, a tribe simulation game blending the conveniences of modern life with the Stone Age!

name: Rc Plane 2
description: Introducing the most realistic RC Plane game and sim for iOS with 6 new game modes, 17 planes to pick from and Game Center achievement and leaderboard integration. The graphics and gameplay in this universal app are stunning and optimized across a range of supported Apple devices with specific optimizations for iPhone 4 Retina Display and both iPad and iPad 2. C

name: The Mirror Dimension
description: The Mirror Dimension is a co-op story-based thriller game that can be played with 2-4 people. The objective of the game is to observe paranormal activity in the house you are visiting as a guest, destroy the incoming spiritual beings. Are you ready to explore the parallel universe?

name: Lord of the Race
description: Welcome to a Horror Open World, Story-Driven, Racing RPG Game. You have shipwrecked on Carbon Crest Island. The Deal is Sealed. Either, Race and Win through the deadly race trials set up by the deranged Count Levoy OR Lose & Suffer an eternity under his mercy.

name: Jett Rider
description: Jett Rider, the most unlikely hero stars in the biggest 2D adventure of the year. Save the planet Gravos, free its people, face the toughest bosses... And don't forget to recycle! A collision in the orbit of the planet Gravos is the starting point of an unforgettable adventure with tons of fun and love for the classics. Jett, the space sweeper, was only supposed to pick up the wreckage of the AC-137 cargo ship, but he soon discovered that something messy was brewing on the surface of Gravos.

name: Plunder: Scourge of the Sea
description: Challenge the malevolent Scourge in Plunder Scourge of the Sea, an immersive MMO pirate adventure. PvP battles, PvE quests, and a race against the curse's evil influence. Unite, craft, build, and rise as a hero to cleanse the seas. Will you succumb or conquer? The fate of all pirates awaits!

name: Mankind
description: You awake on a cold and desolate world. Surrounding you are ruined and unfamiliar shores; shores that must belong to the world you called home. Explore your surroundings, and venture through odd landscapes. If you look hard enough, maybe you’ll uncover glimpses of the past, hidden just out of view.

name: Harmony
description: Out maneuver your opponent without letting them leverage your own pieces against you. play against your friends or the computer to see if you can bring balance to the board.

name: Idle Zoo Park
description: Upgrade Zoo parks, build new ones and become a tycoon like no other!

name: Boaty McBoatwad
description: 16 boat themed maps

name: Squonker 3
description: Squonker 3 is an 8 map megawad for Doom 2 and one of the most anticipated sequels in all of doom wads, featuring breathtaking visuals and hyper polished gameplay.

name: Mayan Reynolds
description: Mayan Reynolds is a small vanilla compatible episode for Doom 2 featuring overgrown ruins and dank caves. The WAD was speed-map project made over the course of a week. Difficulties are implemented. Mouselook, jumping, and crouching should be disabled if you're playing on a port with those features.

name: What Remains
description: What Remains is a vanilla compatible episode for Doom 2, featuring an original soundtrack. In What Remains, you will explore aquatic techbases and what lies beneath the ocean.

name: Dungeon Cleaner
description: Clean and slide endlessly. Dungeon cleaner

name: Knee-Deep in Kdizd
description:
Welcome back to 2008, everyone! Knee-Deep in Kdizd is here, appearing courtesy of The History Channel. That’s right, it’s 2007’s Knee-Deep in ZDoom, now upgraded for vanilla Doom2.exe.

If you’re not familiar with the original Kdizd, that’s okay! (After all, it has been… wow, 15 years?) You can think of Kdikdizd as a Doom E1 remake with larger maps and a combined focus on atmosphere, exploration, and tougher combat. Kdikdizd is also packed full of weird mapping tricks and some really dumb joke﻿s.

name: Puppy Drome
description: A game made for the minild educational compo.

name: Cat got Lost
description: made with flixel

name: Samedi Manor
description: Samedi Manor is an idle game about generating money and resources by building various different types of undead in order to restore Baron Samedi to the Pantheon of Death.

name: Cinderella: Interactive Book
description: Cinderella. Interactive classic stories for all ages.

name: Missing
description: a trifle

name: Theatrics
description: Game made over the weekend.

name: Pixel Paint 2: Ultimate Edition
description:
Pixel Paint 2 is a sequel to an extremely popular game by the same name. The rules are quite simple. Put your mind at ease, follow the numbers, and fill out every last pixel with the right color.

It's your first step in becoming an amazing pixel artist. Choose a theme you like and sink into the wonderful world of pixels.

description: Sin descripción

description:
The party never stops with the Party Harder Pack, Party Fever Pack, Party Even Harder Pack, Excitement Pack, and Happy Happy Pack downloadable content bundle for Party Party Time!
Gather everyone up and party happy, party on!

description: Enter a fantastic world full of magic and charm. Rebuild legendary tales with Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe. A new puzzle game experience awaits.

description:
You are the one who will unravel the truth of the case!
The game is an illustration point and click game in which you use your powers of deduction and observation to solve the truth of a cases from manga!

description: In a country where women hold all the power, a bandit aspires to take the crown.

name: Poda Wants a Statue
description:
Play with your mouse!

Drag and drop bunnies and resources.
Click on upgrades to buy them.

name: Pteranodon
description: A prehistoric singleplayer fps experience featuring unique spear throwing mechanics! Hone your skills as you compete to be the best on the public leaderboard!

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology
description: The Lord of the Rings, The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology offers fans the chance to bring together all the epic The Lord of the Rings battles within a single compilation.

name: Islanders: VR Edition
description:
Islanders is the critically acclaimed minimalist strategy game about building cities on colourful islands. Now coming to VR.

Explore an infinite number of ever-changing new lands, expand your settlements from sprawling villages to vast cities and enjoy the relaxing atmosphere.

In Islanders: VR Edition, you begin with a blank canvas and a small set of minimalist buildings. Your goal is to populate and enrich each island with your creations, unlocking new buildings as you go by achieving a maximum score. Points are earned by carefully placing each building, being mindful of their surroundings like providing clear access to natural resources and making sure entry isn’t blocked.

When you’re ready, you can travel to a new land, exploring Islanders’ stunning new environments along the way, while building bigger, more expansive structures. The more you build, the higher your score will be and the grander city you’ll be able to gaze upon before starting all over again for just one more round.

name: Fading Earth
description: Sin descripción

name: Shotgun Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeon Survivor.io
description: Sin descripción

name: Soldiers Never Die
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Beasts: Gang up!
description: Sin descripción
Each time you press the button, it will either double or lose all the points you've put in. How much will you risk?

name: Hunt Arena: Fire Battle Royale
description: Sin descripción

name: Qube Stories: Escape Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Overwhelmed
description: A game made during Game Jam Madrid Crea. You can skip any level in the game (just check the help menu).

name: Rubido
description: A Chinese checkers / solitaire game with 4 difficulties for Playdate

name: Hana: Spacetime Fantasy
description: Spacetime fantasy adventure game for Playdate

name: Two Point Campus: Medical School
description: Enroll in Medical School today! Join wandering paramedic Vitality Johnson to cure the sick, tackle pesky pirates, and embrace yeti wisdom. Your adventures in medicine start here!

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Deluxe Edition
description:
Rise to the challenge in Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising! This powered up, revamped sequel to GBVS is more enjoyable and accessible than ever before. With simplified input options, even newcomers can engage in thrilling and strategic matches!

The Deluxe Edition includes the main game, 4 color variants for the 28 base characters, 3 weapon skins for the 28 base characters, and the Deluxe Character Pass Part 1 (6 DLC characters and premium avatars, 4 color variants for the 6 DLC characters, 3 weapon skins for the 6 DLC characters, costume "Guider to the Eternal Edge" for Gran, costume "Guider to the Eternal Edge" for Djeeta and Premium Avatar "Vikala (Yin)"). Additionally, the PS4 and PS5 versions include up to 72 hours of Early Access and a Granblue Special Item Set: GBVSR Pack.

name: Join Tiles: Anatolian Game to Play
description: Join Tiles: Anatolian Game to Play is a puzzle game whose aim is to combine broken tiles. Our game, which offers a pleasant and fluent gameplay, contains the works of Anatolian Tile art of hundreds of years.

name: Broforce: Forever
description: The final update offers an improved and expanded campaign with new unlocks, along with six new ultra patriotic bros, four new new democracy-spreading challenge levels, and the ultimate expression of military might – bug fixes!

name: McPixel 3: McPixel Visits Grandma
description:
McPixel Visits Grandma!

In a brand-new update, McPixel gets a letter from grandma telling him to come for a visit! Join McPixel on his visit to grandma’s place and make sure she actually survives the unfortunate encounters McPixel puts her through in a new never-before seen level pack!

In addition to that, two new minigames and a brand new Steve level wait for you in this level pack!

name: Random Dungeon
description:
Dungeon crawler RPG with light town-building elements created in RPG Maker VX by hamusuta. The player controls a trio of adventurers exploring a mysterious dungeon in order to gather funds to revitalize their town. The loot in the dungeon is randomized, with battles being turn-based affairs heavily dependent on the use of status and buffs/debuffs, as well as the right equipment.

The story is mostly humorous and unapologetically yuri, and is presented in a somewhat non-linear manner, with story scenes being unlocked by achieving certain conditions (for example, finding a random weapon in the dungeon, raising your affinity level with a certain character, or using a facility in the town a certain number of times). While the game uses a traditional leveling system, smart use of strategy is rewarded in the form of additional loot and bonus EXP awarded for beating the bosses below a recommended level.

name: Pinball Dreams
description: A portable version of Pinball Dream for the Game Boy. Only includes 3 of the 4 original tables with the removal of Beat Box.

name: Alteira
description:
Alteira is a browser-based RPG (role-playing game). In this fantasy world, you have your own character that you gradually improve, fight against enemies - alone or alongside your comrades, complete daily quests and go through a story that will accompany you throughout the game. The game is played directly in a web browser, so there is no need to download or install anything, only a device with an internet connection and a web browser (for example, a computer, tablet or smartphone) is required.

The game is currently available only in Czech language.

name: Submachine 6: The Edge
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Poly Ego
description: Do you have what it takes to become the next test subject to pass my tests? I've crafted them with care! I'm looking for robots willing to be part of the...good robots! Use your logic to pass the laser experience tests and become a legitimate robot!

name: Submachine: 32 Chambers
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Night Driver
description: Port of the Night Driver arcade game with added color visuals and a changed third person perspective.

name: The Umbrella Ninja
description: Defeat the Evil with your Umbrella!

name: Red Dead Redemption
description: A port for the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Windows. It lacks the multiplayer modes present in the original release.

name: Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare
description: A port for the Switch and PS4 lacking multiplayer modes present in the original release.

name: Red Dead Redemption
description: A bundle containing ports of Red Dead Redemption and the Undead Nightmare expansion missing multiplayer components and including some parts of the GOTY release.

name: Kapi Hospital
description: It’s a popular saying that laughter is the best medicine. The whimsical hospital game Kapi Hospital, offers its players a truly unique browser game-scenario that comes with a wide array of funny features. As young doctor, it’s your task in this game to build your own hospital, equip yourself with truly extraordinary remedies, treat patients suffering from mad diseases, place different treatment rooms and explore the towns of Sniffleton and Fractureford. On top of that, you’ll face thrilling emergency operations, alien-invasions and evil MDs. Experience the exciting upjers-game and play along entirely for free.

name: Clue/Cluedo: The Ultimate Detective’s Package
description: The Ultimate Detective’s Package grants access to ALL themes and character packs. Themes transform the board and characters into exciting new variations. Take a trip to Tinseltown with the Hollywood theme, or follow in the footsteps of the master-detective Sherlock!

name: Submachine 7: The Core
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Goubakuran: RumbleStorm
description: Goubakuran: RumbleStorm is a vertical shoot 'em up that finds humanity on the losing end of a war against a mechanical species that suddenly appeared one day. In their desperation, they send out a lone pilot on a suicide charge against the increasingly encroaching alien armada. This pilot, named Reika, has more than the weight of humanity’s future on her shoulders. The talented engineer who developed the space vessel Reika commandeers is her lover and recently fell into enemy hands. With nothing left the lose and everything to gain, Reika’s ship is launched right past the front lines and into entirely hostile territory.

name: I/O Revision II
description: I/O Revision II is an expanded port of the Japanese sci-fi mystery visual novel for PC, which includes additional story CGs, adds sprites for many minor characters, and bonus CGs.

name: Counterpick Labs
description: Counterpick Labs is a cute, free-to-play platform fighter where players customize their character with quirky weapons and gadgets.

name: Knockout Peoples: Chotto Zankoku na Hakurankai
description: A simple, choose your own adventure title, where players try to keep an ill-mannered pig from being brutally murdered by other animals.

name: NPOZ The Game
description:
A FPS game that you will shoot and kill people with diffrent gamemodes
you can level up and buy guns

name: Heavenly Bodies: Cleanup
description:
Set in and around a vast new space station across 7 days, the Cleanup DLC tasks you to deal with the aftermath of the catastrophic events that took place in the Heavenly Bodies.

Equipped with an array of fancy new tools and devices, you’ll have to repair your debris-damaged station and dispose of hazardous scrap.

Explore a huge new area with the ‘Piloted Manoeuvring Unit’ or ‘PMU’ to collect information to determine what went so wrong in the previous mission.

name: The Legend of Zelda Remastered
description: While this one is not a full remake of Zelda games like what happen to Link’s Awakening, but rather a remastered of The Legend of Zelda original game released for NES back in 1986 to HD using the latest and closest graphics, music and sound to newer Legend of Zelda games, this game is certainly not something to be missed for all Zelda fans and especially to those who never really have a chance playing the original game.

name: Revival Xanadu
description:
Revival Xanadu is a remake of Xanadu: Dragon Slayer II.

The remake distinguishes itself with the more detailed, graphically more advanced character portraits and backgrounds in the various places of interest (inns, temples, shops, etc.). Player and enemy sprites are also drawn in a noticeably more detailed way and have a higher resolution.

However, the side-scrolling exploration environments retain the original look, with "retro" graphics reminiscent of the older original game.

For the most part, the location layout in this remake are the same as in the original version, and the gameplay remains largely unchanged as well.

name: Revival Xanadu 2: Remix
description:
Revival Xanadu 2: Remix is a remake of Xanadu: Scenario 2.

The remake is done using graphics and engine identical to those of Revival Xanadu. Just as its original version was an add-on to Xanadu: Dragon Slayer II, this is an add-on to Revival Xanadu.

The player begins in the same town, creates the protagonist, and then follows the same way to enter the dungeon area, which is the actual game world. It is there that the games become different, as the maps of Revival Xanadu II: Remix are different not only from those of the main game, but also contain layout changes and additions compared to the original version (Xanadu: Scenario 2). New regular enemies and bosses are introduced, and their design is enhanced according to the graphical standards of the previous remake.

name: Submachine 8: The Plan
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: G-Scramble
description: Vertical Scrolling 2D Shooting Game Created by Shooting Game Builder

name: A World of Wishes
description: Nicole has been traumatized by the murder of her mother and father. Haunted by images of a memory she can't recall. Follow Nicole and Gabby's lives as they try and put the pieces together that are tearing at them daily. Something or someone is lurking out in the darkness. Waiting.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 10
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Only Jump!
description: Only Jump is a timed vertical climber, jump by pressing space or A on your controller. Race to get to the top in the fastest time.

name: Pombero: The Lord of the Night - Reborn
description: Explore the Paraguayan countryside in search of clues to your late mother and survive in a hostile environment filled with myths, rituals, Nazis and black magic.

name: Slime Warrior
description: You are the Warrior on a quest to find and defeat the Slime Gladiator. With a limited movement, you need to think carefully about every step until you reach the door. Use your special power, push boxes, find keys, beware of traps, and slay every slime that get in your way!

name: Border Bots VR
description:
Border Bots VR is puzzle simulation set on a future earth where AI is in control. As a human border agent, you begin a new role as a booth operator at an AI travel border. Interact and check over a variety of robots as they try to get through security. Some of their credentials might not be up to scratch, its up to you to make sure they get the stamp of approval.

Analyse Documents

Step into the booth as a border control agent and swiftly process robots by analysing their documents for discrepancies, oddities, undeclared modifications and contraband!

Booth and Apartment Upgrades

Earn credits through challenging gameplay to purchase booth upgrades to keep yourself ahead of the competition. You can also spend your credits on apartment customisations and bring your space to life!

Quirky Robots!

Meet and interact with a variety of quirky robots at the booth and in your apartment! Come face-to-face with sentient appliances as you discover more about their newfound consciousness and colourful personalities.

Variety of Gadgets

Use a variety of tactile gadgets in VR to examine robots at the booth. You'll need different tools for inspection including a 3D printer, Contraband Detector, Stun Gun, Barcode Scanner and much more.

name: Submachine 9: The Temple
description: This is the original flash version of the game in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: The Weapon King
description:
Warrior! Please be awake!
The world is in danger! Now Hurry!!
Evil spirits from the dark dimension are giving everyone a trouble!
Take this sword at once and forge the greatest sword!

name: Space Inversion
description: Space Inversion is the classic arcade Space Invader style shooter. Battle the invading aliens from outer space.

name: Song of Hero: Music RPG
description: The game that will break all your stereo types of previous game experiences. Song of Hero will guide you to the Epic Musical Fantasy You've Never Experienced!

name: Shady Wars
description: Why be a king, when you can be a god? Rap God is now in Shady Wars, developed in partnership with Shady Records. Earn your Rap God props in 135 battles with Rap God and 14 more Shady hits or play in Ken Mode for max protection. MTV News calls it “addictive and fun” for any music fan. It’s a must-have for all true Stans.

name: R-Type
description:
Revisit the 80's (mesh half-shirts and Keds optional) with this classic, old-school shoot 'em up! One of the decade’s most popular arcade games will awaken fond memories of jangling quarters, Jolt Cola and week-old popcorn.

The game is the challenging R-Type you used to play before. Fly through 8 levels with 3 different control options. Play in two difficulty levels. Upgrade with new weapons, power-ups, and attachments. Defeat 8 unique bosses and waves of various enemies.

name: NoteBlaster
description: NoteBlaster is a retro-arcade inspired video game that takes you on a musical journey through space. Using the piano keyboard and drum pad interfaces, you can blast notes to your heart's content as you boost your proficiency with the musical language. Players can use any clef, making it the perfect practice tool for musicians of all types!

name: Jazz Smash
description:
Tap to Smash!
Hit everything and enjoy the sweet music of destruction
Level up to unlock more items and new bats

name: Submachine 10: The Exit
description:
This is the original flash version of the game
in high definition and playable in fullscreen.

name: Itrill
description:
You may become a string player or music conductor...
This game added both western and eastern music. Besides, you can also play with your own iPod music.It brings you entirely new experience with more fun.

name: Fast Diamonds
description: Tap the pink and blue diamonds as fast as you can and test your speed and accuracy as they fall from the sky!

name: Bird Legend
description:
"Bird Legend" is telling your story of heroes fighting vs blocks,bricks,numbers and bombs.
Fresh and original game play, made with honor!
Create your legend now!

name: Balance
description: Do you have feel of balance? Try and you will see....

name: BeatLine
description:
Improvisation, using the rhythm Complete the stage!
If you touch right to move the character to the right.
Touch left side of the character is moved to the left.
Releasing the line returns to the character.
Avoid the obstacles!!!

name: The Amazing Shrinking Giraffe
description:
Explore space in your spaceship, drive around on planets, and get energy from alien creatures and plants.

Ride on the back of giant sand worms, or shrink down and ride on the back of beetles.

Grow to the size of a planet and jump between asteroids.

This is a short experimental type game with an added sandbox component.

name: Farming Simulator C64: Limited Edition
description:
What was believed to be an April fools joke now officially hits the C64. The beautiful limited boxed version contains the game on cartridge, a manual and a Windows executable on CD. Let’s farm like there’s no tomorrow!

A limited physical edition of the game briefly available from Protovision.
This edition was initially shown as part of an exclusive promotional bundle that included a Commodore 64 console, sent to various outlets ahead of Farming Simulator 19's release.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
description:
The game brings "open combat, " offering players more choices in approaching the single-player missions. Makarov returns as the chief villain of the new campaign.

The newly introduced Carry Forward system will let players keep their progression and inventory from Modern Warfare II. Multiplayer fans can expect 16 maps at the launch and at least 12 coming later. Zombies mode will also return and should offer the largest zombie map to date.

name: Heretic Treasure Chest
description: The HTC was a community project aiming to make a 3 episode Heretic Megawad that would run on limit removing ports that support Heretic (i.e. Doomsday, ZDoom etc).

name: Shadows of Chronos
description: 6 map hub for Hexen based around the world of Chronos

name: 2 Sectors
description: This is a compilation of all the contest wads which were sent to the contest held in Newdoom

name: 32 Piece Cliptucky Fried Chicken Special
description: This megawad has 538 monsters across 32 maps! The map # = the monster count: Map 1, 1 monster, map 2, 2 monsters etc. A series of random fun little maps that explore small adventures with wacky random gimmicks etc

name: Clippyworld: An Unexpected Journey
description: Clippyworld: An Unexpected Journey is a very unexpected Journey of my first 22 maps of the Clippy era. Many moons ago before this 10-15 years in the past I tried to make maps but ppl despised them. Clippyworld is my second life as a mapper and these maps seemed to actually be liked this time around. Enjoy a series of random, challenging maps that explore all sorts of random gimmicks and yes, SECRETS GALORE! One map has 100 secrets!

name: Bauhaus
description: Four medium sized maps in the style of Bauhaus-art.

name: Seasonal Affectiveness Disorder
description: As I have Seasonal Affectiveness Disorder I decided to make a map to emulate the feeling - this was on a day freezing rain kept my homebound and covered the city in ice.

name: Pizzeria of Peril
description: Pizzeria of Peril is a limit removing map with only 99 monsters - 11 secrets - and yummy doomcute pizza! Are you up to the task of saving the pizzeria from hoards of demons?

name: Sigma
description: a little adventure

name: For Whom The Bell Tolls
description: map01 has a metal-tech and a bit industrial style map02 (smaller) mostly outdoor-cave style and a bit tech style; see also the informations story: find your friends on a base on mars

name: 10 Sectors
description: From mid-August to mid-September, Doomworld.com held a contest with a simple premise: design the best Boom level you can with only 10 sectors. This is the result.

name: George McGeehan Gamer Hero
description: George McGeehan wants to save a cat! Play this chill platformer by jumping up onto light fixtures and avoid annoying enemies!

name: Gothic Classic
description:
For the first time, relive this amazing RPG on a handheld console and enjoy the game that revolutionized roleplaying games on the go. Dive into dark times and adventures with great performance and a well adapted UI and controls.

War has been waged across the kingdom of Myrtana. Orcish hordes invaded human territory and the king of the land needed a lot of ore to forge enough weapons, should his army stand against this threat. Whoever breaks the law in these darkest of times is sentenced to serve in the giant penal colony of Khorinis, mining the so much needed ore. You are thrown through the barrier into this prison colony. With your back against the wall, you have to survive and form volatile alliances until you can finally escape.

name: WWE SmackDown: Shock Value
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball Deluxe
description: Originally released in 2009 on Blackberry, before being released on Android. It features pinball tables with different themes such as classic Wild West; an underwater exploration featuring an incredibly long table; a space-based table; and finally Brix, which is a mash-up of brick breaking and pinball.

name: AIDS Awareness
description: AIDS Awareness contains 100 questions to test your awareness of the facts about HIV and AIDS. You won't know all of the answers-- in fact, many of the questions are very difficult. As you select your answers, the program will tell you whether you are right or wrong, and it will tell you why. By the time you've answered all of the questions, you will be AIDS Aware.

name: Star Revenge 6: Luigi's Adventure
description:
A 121 star long sm64 hack with all 15 main courses and the overworld replaced with new levels. Simple story, Bowser just took once again over the castle and made new paintings for the stars.
The difficulty begins easy/normal and gets harder to the end.

name: Star Revenge 5: Neo Blue Realm
description:
This is the 5th of the "Star Revenge" Series of SM64 hacks. Not directly visable in the name but this is a remake of SR0.5 UL. The 7 main courses share the same theme with the old hack, but the models itself differ a lot.

For the most part you play as Mario and find yourself in front of a Castle after being send away by a trap in the past. There are 70 stars to find which are mostly easy but some hidden stuff here and there to explore with 3 different endings to this hack.

name: Star Revenge 0.5: The Unused Levels
description:
This is the 0.5th in the "Star Revenge" Series of SM64 hacks. Going by the name, this hack is based on levels made before SR1 and SR2.

The 7 main courses of this hack aren't too complex and are from the times before work on SR1 was restarted because of the release of bigger level patches. The cap switch levels are based on the TTM demo levels, which were made before SR2 NoD was started.

The hack has 65 stars and isn't too hard. Also a "feature" of this update is that you will find a lot of owo and uwu in star names. Why? Because why not.

There is also the remake of this hack called "Star Revenge 5: Neo Blue Realm" which is better than this hack.

name: Dysphoria
description: This is an attempt to make a serious, somber hack, something attempting to be artistic or poetic.

name: Super Mario Legacy
description:
Super Mario Legacy is a traditionally styled platform game inspired primarily by Super Mario Bros. 3 and Yoshi's Island, and is the result of many years of development.

Features 75 challenging stages, colourful graphics, and a ton of ASM enhancements, including a game difficulty option, multiple midway points, hundreds of custom blocks and sprites, and utilization of the SA-1 chip to power features that would otherwise be impossible.

name: SMW: Gaiden
description:
In search of the princess, Mario finds himself led directly to the foot of the Mushroom Kingdom's most seldom challenged mountain, M2. In spite of any anxiety regarding the less then reassuring success rate (1 in 108), he continues without hesitation.

What started as a simple level design exercise spiraled out of control into a full-fledged pseudo collab. Main influences include SMB2J and various Japanese romhacks. We hope to have succeeded in capturing that same feeling.

name: A Very Super Mario World
description: A Super Mario World romhack with eight primary worlds, an extra world, a star world that connects various places, and a special, secret world that will test your mettle (and patience.) The goal of every level is to reach the end, and possibly fight a boss such as a koopaling once you do. Many levels have secret exits that are usually opened by taking a key to a keyhole, as per usual Super Mario World fare. There's many features and gimmicks to many levels, but the feeling of classic Mario platforming typically stays the same. The story is always the same; Mario goes on an adventure to save his friends and the Princess from the evil King Bowser, and along the way jumps, shoots and even flies through the land in search of the castles controlled by Bowser's underlings.

name: Classic Mario World 2: The Great Alliance
description:
Classic Mario World 2: The Great Alliance is a direct sequel for Classic Mario world 1:The Magical Crystals.

After the last adventure Bowser decided to get revenge over the mushroom kingdom by forming an evil alliance with various villains from the mushrooms kingdom lands, its up to Mario to stop him.

This hack has 120 exits.

name: Classic Mario World 3: The Finale
description:
This is a traditional Mario adventure with lots of places to explore, levels in this hack are usually longer than the ones from my previous hacks and even the original SMW but dont worry, this hack features the Multiple Midway points patch,multiple powerups and hidden goodies around to help the player out on their adventure.
Also new to this update are the Longjump and High jump moves seen on my latest hack and some gameplay improvements like the Upward Fireballs and Safe fall patches that can help the players in traversing the levels and lowering a bit in the dificulty department.

name: Super Isikoro Mario World
description: A SMW romhack with 116 exits

name: Luigi's Misadventures 2: Leviathan's Mania
description:
This is a sequel of the Luigi's Misadventures: Tsux Namine's factor.
Full and fleshed hack, feel free to do LP in this hack.

This is a Sonic Mania themed SMW hack, which almost all the levels are based on Sonic Mania.
For those who love Sonic Mania and Super Mario World, this hack is a best option.

name: Luigi's Misadventures: Tsux Namine's Factor
description: A 108 exit romhack of Super Mario World.

name: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator
description: A new entry of the Atelier series makes it way to mobile and PC! Venture into the lands of Lantana and experience the story of Resna crafted by renowned writer Takahiro. The project is being overseen by Atelier series supervisor, Shinichi Yoshiike, while the character designs have been created by Umiugeso and tokki.

name: Super Special World
description:
Welcome to Super Special World!

Mario has happened upon a strange new area located within what seems to be a continuation of the mysterious Special Zone. Romp through a variety of stage themes, including some atypical of the original, and discover all that Super Special World has in store.

If you enjoy a rather classic SMW experience, you're in for a treat - This hack is designed to feel like an extension of the original game (with embellishments).

name: Waluigi's Road to Glory: Horlogic Will Go On
description: The plot of this SMW Hack happens during the events of Luigi's Misadventures 3: Recipe for a disaster. This hack contains 112 exits.

name: Luigi's Misadventures 3: Recipe for a Disaster
description: The full hack of Luigi's Misadventures 3 is here, with 108 exits

name: Luigi's Misadventures 4: Galactic Kids Next Door
description:
This is a sequel of Luigi's Misadventures 3 with 105 exits.
It's about the Galactic Kids Next Door.

name: This Hack Needs a Name
description: A hack of Super Mario World with 118 exits where Mario and Luigi find a strange new world where someone is in need of help.

name: Maid in Heaven: Ai to Iu Na no Yokubou
description: The protagonist has a dream to have a maid someday. One day, his childhood friend, Nagisa, visits him. When they were children, he told Nagisa that he liked maids. Nagisa remembered his words and came to him as a maid. Finally his dream came true and he begins to enjoy his night life with her...

name: The Magic Cooking Pot
description: A 32-exit long romhack for SMW with new characters, enemies, and visuals. The levels are longer compared to those in SMW.

name: Doom: Barracks Zone
description: Doom: Barracks Zone (more commonly called DBZone) is a episode replacement by Tails, Mario and Howie, members of the DOOM Barracks clan and mapping team, primarily comprised of players from Taiwan and Hong Kong. It is meant for ZDoom-based source ports, and contains nine maps primarily aimed towards cooperative multiplayer, but fully playable in single player as well. Development of DBZone started in 2006, with the release of home.wad by Tails, which later evolved into the first map of the episode, DOOM City. The PWAD furthermore has several changes via DeHackEd and DECORATE: many of the vanilla enemies are made to attack or move faster, and a new weapon and monsters are also included.

name: Strain
description: Strain is a 32-level partial conversion for Doom II released in 1997 by the Alpha Dog Alliance. It features nine new or modified monsters through the use of DeHackEd, modified weapons, and a soundtrack written by David "Tolwyn" Shaw, Mark Klem, and Jon Landis. The project had a sporadic development history, exceeding a year due to cyclical interest and disinterest[1].

name: Star Revenge 6.5: Wrath of the Dim. Flower
description:
This is the 6.5th in the "Star Revenge" Series of SM64 hacks.
This hack is based around the idea of the green stars missions of Super Mario Galaxy 2. It also remixes the original stages of SR6 LA into new ones to make it more interesting and not feel the complete same.

In this hack you play again as Luigi like SR6, but this time the paintings inside of Peach's Castle are getting messed up by a huge flower that appeared out of nowhere outside of the castle. You can find 9 main courses in this hack + 2 boss levels.

name: Star Revenge 3.9: Dreamish Block Beats
description:
This is the 3.9th in the "Star Revenge" Series of SM64 hacks. Unlike all the other Star Revenges, this hack's 8 main levels are all 2.5D and themed around the beat blocks found in SR3.5.

The hack is split into 2 difficulties:
Normal mode, which has checkpoints in all levels to save your progress and Hard mode, which removes all the checkpoints.

Hard mode can be unlocked once you master all 8 levels once.
If you want to just beat the hack, you can do once you got 8 stars, you are not forced to do anything on hard.
Doing levels checkpointless is more for dare devils that would try to do it anyway, so it got added into the game.

Since the camera can be limited, the hack comes with screenshoots of the levels so you can plan/see ahead what comes next in the level if needed.

This hack can be pretty hard, even on normal, but it's more a thing of getting the timing down. That said, course 8 is no joke tho.

name: Star Revenge 4.5: The Kedama Takeover Rewritten
description:
This is the 4.5th in the "Star Revenge" Series of SM64 hacks. Probably noticable by the Rewritten at the end of the name, this hack is a remake of SR4. 95% of the levels were made with completely new level models, which were made with the original design of the levels in mind to improve upon them.

This hack has 100 stars and is made in the open world style, which means that you access very few levels via an overworld and rather go from level to level via entrances in the levels itself. There is still an overworld which acts as a place for shortcuts to later levels if a game over happens.

You can find 15 new main courses and some side levels.

name: Pinball Wizard
description: Pinball Wizard is a German pinball game with one non-scrolling table. As usually, the goal is to use the three paddles to keep the ball as long as possible from falling off the screen. Hitting things on the playfield rewards points for the high score list which is saved on the disk. The table also features some additional extras to discover, e.g. hitting a certain spot when the letters "AMIGA" are glowing activates a multi ball. Also included is the option to influence the ball's direction by nudging the screen - but this eventually leads to a tilt.

name: Zen Pinball
description: Think of Zen Pinball as your own personal pinball arcade! The game is a free download featuring many different pinball tables.

name: Super Mario Moonlite World
description:
This mod is a compilation of levels and other assets originally intended for 'Super Mario Moonlight World', thus making it a 'Lite' version, this includes:
- 15 Moonlit levels each more unique than the last
- Dozens of custom tilesets
- An almost entirely original soundtrack to fit the nighttime vibe
- Several custom backgrounds
- Plenty of remodels and retextures of in-game objects, including Odyssey-like moons to collect

name: A Hell of a Soup
description: In this Open World Adventure FPS, your mum sends you on a journey through the desolated lands because she's in desperate need of ingredients for her soup.

name: Servus 64
description:
A Classic-Based Hack, heavily inspired by LUGMILLORD's SM74 and SM74EE.

Your friend lost their wallet in this World. Because he is busy, you have to find and retrieve it for them. It's of great urgency, they might not attend to a Pizza Dinner without it! Will you be able to save it?

Features:
-141 Stars to collect (110 to Final Bowser)
-aglab2 cam patch
-Custom Bowser Fights (No ASM)
-some Custom Music
-mostly Vanilla Textured Levels
-Bonus Area

The Hack starts with basic difficulty (first levels like SM74), and then gets increasingly harder till the end (last levels like SM74EE).

Good luck and enjoy! :)

name: Super Mario: The Power Star Journey
description:
A complete major sm64 hack, "Super Mario-The Power Star Journey" brings you a new adventure for Mario to enjoy!
This hack features:
-97 stars
-25 new worlds to explore
-variable difficulty with some tough moments
-new music that fit the mood & environment
-A new story!

Texts are important since some really give clues to mysteries of the game...
The Readme file is important because it has my youtube channel, & also CRUCIAL because for players with no youtube accounts, the Readme has my E-mail so anyone can reach me...

Can Mario save the King Star & return peace to Mushroom Kingdom once more?

ENJOY THE GAME!!!

name: K-16: Story of Steel
description: The sequel to 2013's Sicari!

name: Torcher: Arsonist of Evil
description: Sin descripción

name: Dynamite Headdy
description: The Game Gear port of Dynamite Headdy. It was later ported for the Master System by Tec Toy, released only in Brazil.

name: Plutonium Mario 64
description:
Plutonium Mario 64 is a major ROM Hack made by usernamesarespiders, featuring 12 main courses with 101 Stars.

Originally dubbed Pluto Mario 64, it was an old Super Mario World hack the creator made years in the past but never was released in public until it was transitioned into Super Mario 64, and the title was named after the dwarf planet orbiting from the Sun, before changing the name after the radioactive chemical metal.

name: Super Mario Stellato
description: A Japanese made hack with stars of varying difficulty, act specific stars, and very large levels. This hack has 107 stars

name: Luigi and the Violet Stars
description:
Bowser has returned [again], and has painted his stars purple and dispersed them from level to level. However, 70 extras have popped up that he isn't aware of... sort of. It is up to Luigi, because Mario is busy with the green ones, the yellow ones, the blue ones, and the red ones, to collect these stars and give Bowser the boot.

Do not let your kids play this game as it has vulgar language.

This game may start out extremely easy, but its difficulty curve goes up quicker than a roller coaster. Don't let your guard down. There is also purple coin comes in some of the levels, which make them very long and very hard. I don't recommend 100%-ing this unless you REALLY want to. Or you want bragging rights... Though, any%ing it is incredibly easy...

name: Detective Gatuma: Get a Clue!
description: Detective Gatuma: Get a Clue! is an upcoming non-linear investigative visual novel where the player, with each mission, must interview witnesses, gather evidence, and find contradictions in the suspects' testimonies to find out who the real culprit is.

name: Heir of the Dog
description:
After a mysterious explosion over Victorian London, Cummerbund Bandersnatch (a likeable, if dim-witted twit) visits his uncle's laboratory and discovers an experimental new formula guaranteeing a "good time" for whoever drinks it. Seduced by the promises in his uncle's journal, Cummerbund decides that it is probably safe to drink and discovers his life will never be the same again.

What may seem like a curse at first, leads Bandersnatch on a thrilling, love-torn adventure through the back alleys of Old London Town as he uncovers a sinister plot involving a secret society, the royal family, copious amounts of dog hair and his uncle at the very centre.

name: Super Mario Infinity: Mystery of the Magic Wand
description: When Mario and Luigi receive a strange invitation to an isolated group of islands called Sea Spot, they accept - and find themselves trapped in a sinister conspiracy involving Bowser, Sea Spot's natives, and a mysterious object known to our heroes only as the Wand. As they explore the archipelago, our heroes struggle to uncover the truth behind the plot surrounding Sea Spot's strange islands...

name: Phobos Dere.GB
description: After uncovering a GameBoy cartridge haunted by a malignant force, a guilt-ridden scientist involved in sinister experiments must face his fears and relive the terrifying nightmares of his past.

name: Haunted Woods!
description: In this exciting Odyssey Adventure, you are Peeno, a fearless archer who must face the dangers of the feared Tamiel Forest to save Princess Bia, who was taken to the center of the forest to serve as an offering to evil spirits to fulfill an ancient curse.

name: Remain 1
description: It's a classic, megawad is partially citing the original Doom2, like if it was that same Doom2, but ..would be not the really the same and sometimes totally not the same...

name: Remain 3
description:
This GZDoom megawad is a retrospective show of the classical Doom from the height of today's abilities of "zdoom in doom" format.

Basically it is in "zdoom in doom" format, but with some gzdoom features and Decorate.

There are no scripts, detail is medium and jumps and crouches are not allowed for forcing you to feel Doom.

name: Eclipse
description:
Two levels for any limit removing port.

The idea for this PWAD came from iddqd.ru. The main concept is: you should create a level using only two IWAD textures and two IWAD flats.

name: Nightomb
description:
One level for any limit removing port.

The idea for this PWAD came from iddqd.ru. The main concept is: you should create a level using only two IWAD textures and two IWAD flats.

name: 3D Tennis
description: 3D Tennis offers fast and fluid control mode: swipe your finger to hit or slice the ball. The game provides a huge range of unique players to choose from and allows you to steer your favorite player to success in the four Grand Slam tournaments.

name: Baker's Dozen
description:
13 levels for any limit removing port

Map01 was made for First Demo Contest on iddqd.ru

Maps 2, 3, 11 and 13 are from Speed Map Contest on iddqd.ru. Each of them is made within 4 hours. Yeah, map13 too. Do you believe it?

Maps 7, 9 and 12 were made for Plutonia2 and were rejected. Map07 is retextured.

name: TNT: Renascence
description: TNT: Renascence (episode 1) is a remake of the first episode (11 levels) of TeamTNT's original TNT: Evolution.

name: End Point
description: End Point is a seven-level PWAD for Doom II. It is a collection of compact, fairly short but action packed maps set in a variety of Earthy themes.

name: Wild Life
description: You are Josué Jorge and about to embark on an amazing Odyssey in search of the Chalice of Immortality. The place is the legendary island of Ginnugahar, which is a living territory, hungry for the life energy of anyone who dares set foot there and search for the relic. Watch your time over there, because the minute you enter the forest, its chronometer will start and until it stops, your life force will be sucked as it counts down. Finish the quest before time runs out or forever be part of that dreaded piece of land!

name: Alexia
description:
Yuuga Kamijo and Hotaru Shinonome were freshmen in high school, living in the same apartment building. They were so close that they walked to and from school together every day.
Then one day after school, Yuuga meets an older student who calls herself "Manami."
With Manami's addition to their daily life, the ordinary routine is gradually taking an unexpected turn.
What is life? What is happiness?
Self-love, self-hatred, self-denial, self-made choice, the story of a boy's rebirth after losing his reason for living.

name: Banmeng Yexing: A Journey on Limbus
description: Sin descripción

name: Hotel Hima
description:
One day, a boy named Stepan (Styu) wakes up and realizes that this is his last night at home.

His mother tells him that he is moving to a hotel for a month. Not just any, but a real Carpathian Castle.

It has everything that a person can imagine when they think of entertainment. Billiards, swimming pool, water park, massage, aromatherapy and even roller coasters.

Will Styu be able to cope with the challenges he faces? With your childhood fears and the yoke of adulthood? Will he find a job or become homeless?

Or maybe it's all about something else? You will be able to find out in this fascinating short story.

name: Sandstorm!
description: You are Josué Jorge and you have time-traveled to the ancient world of Egypt in search of the Crowns of Power. They are hidden inside the labyrinthine and macabre Great Pyramids and guarded by powerful deities. Now, our hero must face unexpected dangers such as giant spiders, poisonous snakes, and, if that’s not enough, time itself because if the countdown reaches zero, he will be forever stuck in the past….

name: War Machines: Tanks Battle Game
description: Get ready for the ultimate tank battle experience in War Machines, a tank game that allows you to command your own army of powerful machines and bring destruction upon your enemies. Dive into intense, heart-pounding tank battles and prove your skills in this war game!

name: Kaiser of Singularity
description:
A fourth-year expelled student returns to his hometown, hoping to reconnect with old friends.
While hacking into the abyss of the unconscious, he will search for answers to numerous questions: how to overcome alienation, how to restore the course of time, and why this world is imprisoned either in the past or in somebody else's future.
Surveillance cameras, protective rituals, videotapes with old films, secret networks outside the networks, the search for oneself and one's place in reality.
What of this is real and what is psychosis which resulted from a man-made disaster?

name: Zombie Roadkill 3D
description:
Zombie Roadkill is a action game that blends the boundaries of classic shooter games and timeless racing games. The rules are very simple - slay the endless waves of zombies or have your brain eaten.
When your hometown is overrun by the zombies, the only thing left to do soon becomes clear - drive your way through a zombie apocalypse! Zombie Roadkill sees you not only driving your way through hordes of the walking dead, but allows you to shoot down the zombies using machine guns and RPGs equipped on the car. Is your vehicle strong enough for the challenges as your inevitable doom closes in around you?

name: Bomberman Tower
description: A Modernized rogue-lite Bomberman fan game inspired by Pocket Bomberman!

name: Reach the light
description: The precision platformer where you climb the biggest mountain in the world to reach the light. Explore mysterious places and meet weird creatures on this difficult journey!

name: Deep Abyss 3D
description: Famous 3d platform game in which you must avoid falling into the lava or running out of time that was preinstalled on some sony ericsson cell phones

name: Gangstar: Miami Vindication 2D
description:
Open world action/adventure game similar to Grand Theft Auto. The game follows a middle-aged man named Johnny Gainesville, who is in search for his brother, who was last seen in Miami.
This version of the game that has 2D graphics was made for java devices.

name: Divine Guardian
description: Explore the enchanted Vietnamese jungle, combat mystical monsters, and rescue creatures on your quest to challenge the gods and restore harmony to the Universe as the DIVINE GUARDIAN, immerse yourself in an epic 2D hand-drawn refreshing adventure.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5 - Collector's Edition
description: "Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5" is a hidden object game that offers you an exciting journey through 15 beautiful European countries.
