During the game, you will find interesting objects in historical places of Europe and Scandinavia, play exciting mini-games and collect tons of objects souvenirs.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 9
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Mortal Street Fighter
description: The player takes on the role of a fighter who has to fight enemies that appear on the way. The fight is mostly fisted, only from time to time the player finds some kind of weapon on the stage. The characters in the game have specific designs for fighters.

name: Lost Balloons: Airy mates
description: "If only I could fly free in that sky..." This is a hard action-adventure game that should be played while holding on to the memories of those days of floating balloons with such thoughts in mind. Easy among the LOST object series by KIMIDORI SOFT, so it is recommended for first-time players.

name: Knight Cats: Leaves on the Road
description: Welcome to Catstown, a scenic village with beautiful views, quaint cobblestone pathways, and stunning architecture!

name: Pocket Pix
description: A pixel art animation tool in your pocket

name: The King of Fighters XV: Character - Najd
description: "NAJD" can be used in The King of Fighters XV.

name: Aya & Naya
description: An Action third-person shooter game

name: Cosmik Battle
description: Cosmik Battle is the next generation Trading Card Game pitting players in exhilarating 1v1 space battles. Pick your spaceship, gather resources, craft your cards, build outrageous decks and reduce your enemies' ships to dust to become the greatest space fighter in the galaxy!

name: Schism
description:
Continuing the tradition of modernizing Doom, Schism brings its own unique and innovative twists. Through six years of development, it has seen massive upgrades which have, in their own right, bolstered the game to something much more than most of other Brutal Doom based projects.

New classes have been added, such as the Paladin — bestowed with improved renditions of a few of Hexen's iconic relics, as well as other new and absolutely savage melee weapons — and the Sorcerer — a master elementalist with an all-obliterating, wide array of magics that make the BFG9000 look utterly flaccid. The classic UAC Marine recieved multiple new firearms designed to round out his arsenal. All classes can use firearms, though only the UAC Marine can use all of them. Despite these massively powerful additions, Schism is not a power fantasy. New, much more dangerous foes await the heroes, while the pre-existing roster was rebalanced.

name: Relic
description: Relic, a set of 4 adventurous maps with devious traps in a jungle setting. There's also a fifth thank you map at the end. Difficulties are implemented; UV is pretty nasty so unless you want that kind of heat, give HMP a go!

name: Grime
description: A set of 5 maps using the Duke 3D texture pack.

name: Sniper Assassin
description: Sniper Assassin is an assassination simulator where you eliminate your target based on the mission briefing. You can’t just go around and kill anyone you see, you have to shoot the specific target.

name: 100 Line Massacre
description:
100 Line Massacre is a small Megawad project (Full 32 maps + 3 Bonus) by NinjaDelphox and Arsinikk with the goal of making Vanilla- Compatible maps with the limit of 100 lines.

All maps were designed with pistol start in mind, though continuous play is perfectly fine. Each map should take only around 2-5 minutes to finish.

In addition to the 100 line limit, the other goal was to add variety to the megawad by alternating authorship with each map, combining Ninja's heavy emphasis on challenge and combat mixing with Arsinikk's more experimental maps of Vanilla tricks and exploits.

name: 128 Linedefs, 64 Things
description:
A Vanilla Community Project with one rule: Each map could at most only have 128 Linedefs and 64 Things.

The megawad comes with 32 maps (+ 3 bonus) from the Doomworld Community, both old and new!

All maps were designed with pistol start in mind, though continuous play is perfectly fine.

name: 100 Line Christmas
description:
100 Line Christmas is a mini community project targeting Vanilla Doom 2 (complevel 2). The project is inspired by Arsinikk and NinjaDelphox's 100 Line Massacre.

As the 100 in the title suggests, each map was limited to 100 lines at most. Mappers were only given one week to make maps for the project.

The megawad comes with 30 maps (28 normal + 2 secret) from the Doomworld Community! All maps were designed with pistol start in mind, though continuous play is perfectly fine. Eachï»¿ map should take around 2-5 minutes to finish.

name: Purple Rain
description: Purple Rain is a short 5-10 minute single map that has been designed to work with Dehacked Vanilla Doom. The map has been throughly tested to make sure that none of the Vanilla Doom errors like VPOs and Savegame Buffer occur. The intended difficulty is Ultra-Violence but all skills are implemented (not sure if Nightmare/Fast is possible).

name: I Commissioned Some Bunnies 2
description: I paid artists to hide bunnies and carrots in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Flow Parkour
description: A simple yet fun platformer game made with the game engine unity.

name: Puyo Ponyo Lines
description: Join the kawaii puyoponyo! Form a line and clear them now! Many stages are waiting for you!

name: The Visitors from Mir
description:
A fun and easy game for all ages. The Mir aliens have come to Earth along with the Groog. Do they come in peace?
Mastering this game seems easy but to score a perfect game is puzzling unless you are the clever one.
This game carries a message of peace and the only violence in this game is bopping the aliens on the head. No one dies and no gore.
Sounds best with earbuds and is a great game for zoning out and also has a lesson for kids. Game has multiple end game messages based on your performance. Info window has settings for difficulty level and time period (1 to 10 minutes).

name: Give It Up! 3
description:
Increased the difficulty to challenge your limit!
Intensified the rhythm to intrude your pace!
Don’t believe me? Dare you try it?

name: Fruit Frenzy
description:
Fruit Frenzy is a one of a kind unique experience for all match 3 game lovers.
Journey through 100 levels with brand new game modes to help save your fruity friends as you battle to defeat the vicious veggies.

name: Ball Master Up!
description: Ball Master Up! is an addictive arcade game where you play as a small ball and compete against time and your skills. Your goal is to eat as many bubbles as possible to get the maximum score.

name: Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip XXL
description:
Monster Roadtrip adds a twist to its predecessors Monster Prom and Monster Camp, multiplayer dating sims brimming with beautiful art and unapologetic humor.

This sequel takes you on an unforgettable road trip along with fan-favorites Scott and Polly. On the way, you will stay at crummy motels, engage in dark cult rituals, help out strangers on the road and pick up more hitchhikers than Scott can count. Bump into old friends and meet plenty of new faces on your way to one of six destinations.

But that’s not all! The XXL version includes ALL of the DLC playable characters: Zoe, Juan, Hazel and Glitch.

name: Ace Antigravity Combat Racing
description: One and Only! Ultimate Antigravity Racing Game!

name: Mouse Trap
description: Mouse Trap is back with a snap! It’s the chaotic board game you remember! Join your friends and race to collect the most cheese.

name: Prison Life Simulator Jail: Gangster Escape Games Scary Architect Battle
description: Outwit, Outplay, Outlast: The Ultimate Prison Life Simulator!

name: Apex Legends: Resurrection
description: For almost 300 years, Revenant was under the Syndicate’s thumb with the help of Hammond, and all he wanted was to escape. Now, suddenly, he starts to glitch—someone has launched a new protocol. He finds that he’s able to see enemies low on health, unleash a powerful leap forward, and forge a shroud of shadows around him that blocks incoming damage. But he also knows how to hold a grudge.

name: Jantei: Battle Cos-Player
description: Sin descripción

name: Platonic Archetypes of Dice
description: The Eighth Climate qua Casino.

name: Therapy Game
description: Experimental game by increpare.

name: Version Control
description: Experimental increpare game.

name: Blockdude
description: Blokdude is a remake of the well known TI Caluculator game from Brandon Sterner as well as the blockman game from Soleau Software. This version of the game is based on the GP2X port of blockdude.

name: Ether @ Net
description: Unravel the supernatural mysteries in Ether @ Net! As a internet technician, explore a Hong Kong haunted apartments, face otherworldly forces, and team up with a spiritual guide and haunted couple. An exciting blend of mystery and adventure awaits in this thrilling game!

name: Songs of the Damned
description: Songs of the Damned is a single-level PWAD for Doom II released in 2006. It was designed by Trevor Primmett (iori) for Boom-compatible source ports.

name: Pac-Land
description: NES/Famicom port of Pac-Land.

name: Crimson Canyon
description: Crimson Canyon is a WAD, created by Jeffrey Graham in 2005. It contains 12 maps. The WAD received one of the 12th Annual Cacowards.

name: Pac-Land
description: Atari Lynx port of Pac-Man.

name: 3 Heures D'Agonie 2
description: 3 heures d'agonie 2 (3 hours of agony 2) is a 32-level vanilla-compatible megawad created by members of the French Doom community. It is the second WAD in the 3 heures d'agonie series, and like its predecessor, the concept was that each map was designed within a three hour time period, though differing from most speedmapping events in that there was no singular mapping period, allowing authors to make multiple maps. The project was released on 30 November, 2014.

name: Frig
description: Sin descripción

name: 3 Heures D'Agonie 3
description:
3 Heures d'Agonie 3 is a 32-level vanilla-compatible megawad created by members of the French Doom community. It is the final megawad in the 3 heures d'agonie series, and as with its two predecessors, most maps were made within a three hour time period, differing from most speedmapping events in that there was no singular mapping session, allowing authors to make multiple maps. The project started on 20 January, 2015, not long after the release of the second WAD, but was not released until 6 April, 2017.

Although it was considered to be the end of the 3 heures d'agonie series, a single level, L'agonie Finale, was released in 2018.

name: Pac-Land
description: MSX port of Pac-Land.

name: Grave
description:
The game about being buried alive.
About being powerless.

name: Pac-Land
description: ZX Spectrum port of Pac-Land.

name: Pac-Land
description: Amstrad CPC port of Pac-Land.

name: World End Heart Girl
description: After a certain mission, a bunch of Songstress' Songbird Angels were given their own HEART WORLDS to look after as a prize..... with loads of awesomefun humans in them...... wow....

name: Pac-Land
description: Commodore 64 port of Pac-Land.

name: Afterline Airlines
description: Help Jules look for his cat Parsnip, in the airport between Life and Death!

name: Punch Club 2: Fast Forward - Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: EarthX: Future Astronauts Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: LCD, Please
description: Passport control in your pocket

name: Parkour
description: Sin descripción

name: Mile High Taxi: Race Mode
description: Buckle up for Mile High Taxi's "Race Mode" DLC! Engage in pulse-pounding races, blast through the city at 400kph with InstaBoosts, and outpace rival hover cabs in this free, high-octane expansion!

name: Junkyard Dive
description: Run, jump, bounce and dive...but don't fall too far! The path is short, but it is very difficult. You will need a high level of strategy to complete the challenges that await you.

name: Fix Me Up Doc!: Dark Humor
description: This is a parody game with dark humor, with such unbelievable graphics and so intense levels that you can even feel the smell.

name: Armadosia: The Mad Corridor
description: Armadosia: The Mad Corridor is a megawad for Doom II, meant for limit-removing source ports. It was designed by David Rivette (Arma Kero), and features 32 very large, exploration-focused levels, plus a host of new textures and flats, but no new music or story. It was originally released on March 1, 2005, and saw several updates containing bug and compatibility fixes over the years, with the latest version (2.1) being released in May 2016.

name: Saints Row: A Song of Ice & Dust
description: When a crippling ambush decimates the Dustlanders, it's up to fierce rivals Bossonius and Gwendolyn Firebird to join forces and defend The DustFaire from the Frostlanders, paintball by paintball.

name: Lost and Found
description: Sin descripción

name: The Big, Friendly Thud!
description: BF_THUD!, which stands for The Big, Friendly THUD!, is a 1995 megawad for Doom II. It was designed by Christen Klie, and includes half a dozen levels from his earlier ChrisK, which was itself based on his earlier Chris_E1, and which were also re-used in The Lost Episodes of Doom.

name: Bella II
description:
Bella II is a megawad for Doom II by Paul Corfiatis and Chris Hansen that was released in 2003. Difficulty is medium to difficult throughout and the theme varies from level to level. Some of the maps are experimental. ZDoom is required for best gameplay results.

There are 43 levels in total, 35 main maps including 5 secret levels. You must destroy John Romero and rescue MassMouth.

name: Bella
description: 10 Levels for Zdoom, Plus 2 secret levels. Each level has all new challenges awaiting you. Plenty of use of the features in Zdoom like stealth enemies. There are also some new enemies capable of peforming the most unexpected tricks. There is no scripting this wad because I havent figured it out. There are 3 new types of Cacodemon, 1 new Cybderdemon, 1 new Mancubus 2 new Hell Knights. You're mission is to Save the backpack from the white Super Cybderdemon and kill yet another giant spider. Secret exits are in Level 1 and 8, both are extremley difficult to figure out, but the secret levels are the most stunning.

name: The Boggy Region
description:
Sooner or later, all cool guys die. No matter why. So the marine does.

26 map megawad.

name: Kodoku no Yurikago
description:
"That day..."
It's been a year since July 22, but the trauma still haunts me.
Mio died, Kazuha disappeared.
And I was left all alone to continue my dismal existence in a murky, hazy world.
But then, out of nowhere, Mio, whom I thought dead, reappeared before me.
She introduced herself as a transfer student. Apparently, she wasn't the Mio I knew, just a stranger who looked a great deal like her.
Now, tell me, do coincidences like this usually happen?

name: New English Training: Learning with Tempo - Advanced Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Krila
description: What is the novel about? Everything is very simple! About the girl Marie, who is stuck in a traumatic situation. The girl's psyche tries to protect itself from even more trauma by escaping from reality. Where will it lead her? Will she be able to adapt to a new place - in an orphanage - and solve all its secrets?

name: New English Training: Learning with Tempo - Beginners Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cleimos
description: Cleimos is a Doom episode replacement mod of nine levels, created by Rand and Steven Phares. It had a sequel made for Doom II, Cleimos 2.

name: Cleimos II
description: Cleimos II is a Doom II megawad replacing all 32 levels, created by Rand and Steven Phares in 1995. It is the sequel to Cleimos.

name: Claustrophobia 1024
description: Claustrophobia 1024 is a 2009 megawad, and the spiritual successor to Congestion 1024. Similarly to its predecessor, all of its levels are designed such that gameplay is restricted to an area of 1024×1024 map units. The project was led by Brett Harrell, began on July 10, 2008, and was released on June 17, 2009.

name: Rain & Chamomile Tea
description: The story of a girl who wakes up in an unfamiliar beachside town after a nightmarish sort of mania. The air is thick with fog and the smell of rot; it almost seems as if something is hiding from her.

name: Claustrophobia 1024 2: The Mystery of Too Many Maps
description: Claustrophobia 1024 2: The Mystery of Too Many Maps is a 2010 megawad for Boom-compatible source ports. It consists of levels that were left out of the original Claustrophobia 1024, as well as some original levels. It is the result of a project begun by Joonas Äijälä (Jodwin) to improve levels from the alpha stage of Claustrophobia 1024's development that were removed for quality reasons; consequently, most of the levels originate from the alpha stage. Others were developed for the beta stage of development, but were removed as the result of there being too many levels to fit into a full megawad, hence the subtitle. The WAD was released on January 7, 2010.

name: Dark Tartarus
description:
Dark Tartarus is a Doom II megawad designed for ZDoom-based ports, created by lihanchi. It is a set of very challenging maps, many veering into slaughter map territory on higher difficulties, often with novel, eclectic concepts and themes that set it apart from many other challenging wads.

Development for Dark Tartarus began in late 2012, with the first version of the mod, containing 32 maps, released on December of that year. This was followed in January by a patch, tartarus-sns, which added minor tweaks and fixed some compatibility issues with the software renderer, and later by version 2 which included significant map overhauls. Version 3, besides having even more changes to the original 32 maps, saw the addition of a new episode called Dark Tartarus: Dead Tonight. While the lineup of original maps remained unchanged over the next two updates, Version 4 and 5, the set of maps for Dead Tonight changed between each version, with the latest, Version 5, released in April 2015, having a total of 43 maps.

name: Plutonia 3: Going to Surface
description: Plutonia 3: Going to Surface (sometimes corrected as Plutonia 3: Going to the Surface) is a 32-level megawad created by Sergey Andreevich Burow (SilverMiner) as an unofficial sequel to Plutonia 2. It is known for its poor quality, involving many rookie map errors and poor map design. Plutonia 3 was uploaded to the idgames archive on July 2, 2017 and was later removed from the archive completely. An unofficial joke sequel, Plutonia 4, was made by Gothic as an April Fools joke in 2018.

name: Plutonia 4: Back to Your Hole
description: Plutonia 4: Back to Your Hole (sometimes simply called Plutonia 4), is a limit removing joke WAD with 32 levels created by Roberto Lopez (Gothic). Originally made as a homage to SilverMiner's Plutonia 3: Going to Surface, the WAD themes are inspired by Plutonia and its unofficial sequel. As with many joke WADs, Plutonia 4 includes farcical elements such as ridiculous enemy placement, intentionally unpleasant map design, and humorous custom graphics.

name: Plutonia 7: Going to the Hell
description: Plutonia 7: Going to the Hell, (sometimes simply called Plutonia 7), is a Boom-compatible joke WAD for Plutonia with 32 levels created by DoomTheRobot and General Roasterock.

name: Doomworld Mega Project 2013
description: Doomworld Mega Project 2013 is a collaborative megawad, containing 54 maps from 55 different mappers from the Doomworld forums. Similarly to the previous Doomworld Mega Project 2012, it accepted any and all maps for Doom II regardless of engine used, theme, content, or quality; in this edition, the only limitations were that the maps could not use MAP07 or MAP30 slots or secret level exits, and could not be potentially damaging to the user (e.g. by using scripts to change port settings, or using zip bombs).

name: Doomworld Mega Project 2012
description: Doomworld Mega Project 2012 (originally named just Doomworld Mega Project) is a collaborative megawad, containing 40 maps from 40 different mappers from the Doomworld forums. The project was started by TimeOfDeath on March 13, 2012, the first version was released on December 16, 2012, and the final version was created on January 29, 2013. The completed WAD was uploaded to the /idgames archive on March 1, 2013.

name: Fragport
description: Fragport is a megawad created by Stephen Clark (The Ultimate DooMer). First released in 2001 (with a later 2011 update containing minor fixes and adjustments), the WAD is notable for its seamless progression between most of the levels, with each new map's initial area being introduced by the previous map's exit location, as well as its penchant for attempting to create more life-like environments than some of its peers.

name: Hadephobia
description: Hadephobia is a 2013 megawad for Boom-compatible source ports. It was started in 2010 by Chris Bourke (purist) under the name "Progressive Fiction," in which the levels would follow a continuous storyline written by the designers, and each of them would begin where the previous map left off. The map set was a runner-up at the 20th Annual Cacowards.

name: Rabbit's All-Comers Mapping Project
description:
Rabbit's All-comers Mapping Project (commonly known as RAMP) was a mapping event held in June and July 2021 by David Newton (DavidN) aimed at encouraging newcomers to try mapping for Doom, much like the Doom Upstart Mapping Project which inspired this project. Mappers of all skill levels and experience were welcome to participate and were allowed to map in any map format, with the entire project being tied together using GZDoom and maps being loaded from a hub level. Mappers submitted their maps to a site created specifically for the project by DavidN, which included a new tool to automatically compile new maps into the project as they were uploaded to the site.

This project has 209 maps.

name: Crucified Dreams
description: Crucified Dreams is a 42-level Doom II deathmatch megawad for BOOM-compatible source ports. Released on June 16, 2006, it is a spiritual sequel of GothicDM (1997), GothicDM 2 (1998), and Gothic 99. A handful of its team members also contributed to the Gothic Deathmatches series. The project was started in 1998 by Scott Cover (Covaro) with the project lead role handed over to Derek MacDonald (Afterglow) in 2000.

name: Lunar Catastrophe
description: Lunar Catastrophe is a classic-themed megawad for Doom released on December 30, 2018. A joint-effort by partners Samantha McNallen (Miss Bubbles) & Derek Pierson (Count651), the four episode megawad is heavily inspired by Doom's abstract level design, taking inspiration not only from John Romero but Sandy Petersen and Tom Hall as well. It took two years to make, with both creators splitting the workload evenly. It was a runner-up in the Cacowards 2019.

name: Snowdome
description: For Tan Yan, there is little hope his life will change. It's like his whole life is trapped inside a snowdome, unable to escape. But, what if, one day, he's given the chance to make a change?

name: Rabbit's All-Comers Mapping Project 2022
description:
RAMP 2022 is the second iteration of the Rabbit's All-comers Mapping Project! In June 2022, mappers old and new came together to create their own maps for Doom 2 centered around a gigantic 117-map hub level.

Once again, take the chance to dip into one of the widest variety packs in the Doom community - explore icy castles, wade through flooded techbases, visit hellish caves, and take part in several strange demonic games. Also collect paintings and hang them up around the hub to spruce it up a bit - a massive thanks to the various artists around the Doom fandom that generously provided their artwork for use in the game!

name: Rabbit's All-Comers Mapping Project 2023
description: RAMP 2023 is the third edition of the Rabbit's All-comers Mapping Project! Like the others before it, it's a compilation of 296 maps submitted by members of the Doom community, both new and old. The game is centered around a hub level, with completion of the submitted maps allowing players to progress in the hub.

name: Wonderland Secret Worlds
description: The unique mix of puzzle solving and arcade/action is back in Wonderland Secret Worlds. A magical storm has blown into Wonderland and swept away the little Stinkers. It is up to you to rescue them. Control Wonderland's four heroes - Stinky, Loof, Qookie, and Peegue - through over a hundred new levels in the diverse worlds of Wonderland.

name: Omega no Shikai 1. Shiki no Hajimari
description: Sin descripción

name: Omega no Shikai: Aki Kaketa Shiki no Ai
description: Sin descripción

name: Essence Child
description:
Essence Child, solve the puzzle, save your planet!
The sun, which revolves around the planet of the ancients is nearing its last days. The only way to avoid its destruction and keep the planet alive is to find the mystic liquid, celatin. Unfortunately, the celatin is locked deep within a chamber of puzzles. Only you can rescue the planet!

name: Omega no Shikai: Aki Kaketa Shiki no Ai: Zan
description: Sin descripción

name: Omega no Shikai: Miyo Owareru Shimai Towa(●nd)
description: Sin descripción

name: Omega Strikers: Season 2 - Summer Splash
description: Throw on your bathing suit, get on that sunscreen, grab a towel and a 6 pack of Super Surge.

name: Instarion
description: Sci-Fi MMO game in a seamless universe with an emphasis on travel, exploration and quests.

name: Zaojiao Leyuan wo de Tonghua Huiben: Xiaohai tu de Gushi
description: iQue DSi exclusive interactive storybook which translates to "The Sea Hare", a censored version of the Grimm's fairy tale under the same name.

name: Sylvan Disappearance
description: Sylvan Disappearance is a mystery visual novel with an epistolary component. In the course of the story, you follow Mirabelle's life in a seaside city, and read the correspondence she receives from her friends Martin and Célia.

name: The Clown
description: Play as an unnamed female narrator as you suddenly wake up in a dark room, and move around to find yourself in a circus theater where you will witness probably one of the most disturbing things in your life.

name: Seishin Hakai
description: That bizarre incident occurred at 8 PM. Girl student was murdered with face distorted violently. Strange killings keep happening around the hero. When judgement and emotions disappear something is going to break...

name: Sayonara, Utsutsu.
description:
"You have to save this world. That's not my whim, the world itself desires it."
The transfer student by the name Minayo said that and gave Kadzuki a syringe. By using it he traveled to a different world "Mundos" that, in some ways, resembles reality. There he fought, as a savior, against monsters called "Mortalis" that destroy the very fabric of the reality he knows. That brought an end to his "role" and "everyday life" he was so fed up with. Like mad he spent his time as a hero fighting for the world's salvation. A true story that from a first glance resembles drug-induced hallucinations.

name: Wooo 2
description: Wooo 2 is a 38 level joke WAD for Doom II, requiring a ZDoom based source port. The WAD is a sequel to WOOO, and just like its predecessor, the WAD relies on ridiculous enemy placement, gratuitous abuse of ZDoom features, and intentionally terrible map design. The WAD was uploaded on /idgames archive on September 1, 2014. At the Cacowards 2014 it became a runner-up for the Mockaward. The sequel, Wooo 3, was released two years later.

name: Wooo
description: Wooo is 32 level joke WAD for Doom II, requiring a ZDoom based source port. Similar to Mock 2: The Speed of Stupid, the WAD relies on ridiculous enemy placement, gratuitous abuse of ZDoom features, and intentionally terrible map design. The WAD was uploaded on /idgames archive on October 25, 2013. At the Cacowards 2013 it was highlighted in a "Sing the Praises of Pants" sidebar. The sequel, Wooo 2, was released a year later.

name: Apathy: Inaba Hyakumantetsu in Narugami Gakuen Reikaiki
description:
A special feature on the school's Seven Wonders planned by Narukami Gakuen's newspaper club.
However, there are constant rumors that first-year student Shuichi Sakagami, who participated in the project, has gone missing after the meeting of the Seven Wonders.

The truth emerges while listening to the events of the day from Makoto Shindo, Yukihito Ayanokoji, Nozomu Kazama, Akemi Iwashita, and Tomoharu Hosoda, Shoji Arai and Reiko Fukuzawa, the storytellers of the Seven Wonders who participated in the meeting.

Did Shuichi Sakagami really go missing?

name: ZPack: Random Maps for ZDoom
description: ZPack - Random Maps for ZDoom is a 2008 megawad by members of the ZDoom community which contains 30 levels, divided into three 10 map episodes. It requires ZDoom 2.2.0 or later to play (or alternatively, GZDoom 1.1.0 or later). Although the maps are divided into episodes and use the ExMx lump name scheme, the wad is for the Doom II IWAD.

name: Kurai Nichiyoubi: Sombre Dimanche
description:
It's the sixth day of incessant rain in the city.
The entire country had been shaken by a series of bizarre murders, occuring late at night on a deserted street.
Because slashing throats and tearing open stomachs were his modus operandi, the criminal was rumored to be a "Modern-day Jack the Ripper."

name: Kyojin-tachi
description:
High school Fukurasuzume is one of the prefecture's most advanced schools. Ruled by principles of rigorism, it puts the students' discipline first. If a perfect high school exists, it must be it. As now almost everyone goes to uni, it is difficult for schools to stand out. Yet, it being so classy, everyone wanted to enter Fukurasuzume and not some other high school. It didn't become such a place out of the blue, though. In it, a secret organization handles all the misconducts of both internal and external parties. And it has a name - chemistry club. They deal with everything, starting from shoplifting and deplorable acts of theft to deaths, homicides, and disappearances before the police so much as catches wind of the fact anything happened. Yeah, that chemistry club is that influential. Don't ask me. I have no idea why that's the case; I'm just your regular investigator and all.

At the tender age of 18, he is an undercover investigator and the head of the Second Investigative Security Division of the chemistry club. As is appropriate for his age, he goes to school as a regular student and is tasked with preventing different trivial and not so trivial incidents.

However, one fall, our hero embarks on yet another investigation. That's when the story begins in earnest.

Our protagonist advances the story. It leads him to the truth behind the crime. However, he feels as if something isn't quite right. Why? Honestly, he has no idea. But he has thoughts in his head he himself doesn't quite understand. That's when our protagonist notices what this case is really about and the poison contained in it.

name: Trench Runner!
description: Trunkal has the three most coveted moons in the galaxy, natural sources of unique energy power, they generate all the energy for the planet, and there is also all the military defense that has always prevented any attempt at alien invasion, in all there are 72 stations scattered across the moons, but the unlikely happened, the Kirgons, an alien race that consumed all the resources of their planet discovered that Trunkul can become the perfect environment for a new home. Then, one day, 72 machines known as sentinels, invaded Trunkul's defense system and took over the lunar facilities ending all defense of the planet, If that wasn't enough, they also drained the moon's energy to charge a ray that would be fired and annihilate all life on the planet. But the resistance has figured out how to disable the sentinels, and only the best pilot in the galaxy, Michael Gabes aboard the X-1 can accomplish the mission before the beam charges and fires....

name: Tunnels of Terror!
description:
Something different is happening in the Galaxy: a mysterious cataclysmic event has caused several interdimensional tunnels to open in space, and you are the patrolman Jonas aboard the Twister of Central Command. Without connection and with intense lights invading your cabin, your only alternative is to destroy the ships that cross the tunnels of terror. Several levels and five different enemies alternate phases in a game with a breakneck pace in which you won’t have a minute of peace or it will be the end of you.
Embark on this odyssey…

name: Nectar Wars
description:
When the kingdom of the Bees becomes consumed with greed, they declare war in their search for the all-powerful Nectar. Led by their Queen, Beeatrix, the bee army has forged alliances across the globe to expand their reign of terror. It is up to the elemental guardians, five hummingbird sisters, to fend off this attack and restore balance to the land.

An explosive Shoot ‘Em Up like no other, Nectar focuses on five hummingbird sisters, each with their own playstyle. Defeat powerful bosses, unlock new cosmetics, compete in online leaderboards, and save the world in this globe-trotting adventure!

name: Bald Man Climbs Up
description: A bald man with a unique weapon attempts to get as high as possible

name: AstroMania
description:
Become the greatest alien-destroying robot the world has seen...

After Earth is overrun and invaded by an alien race, there’s only one robot who can fight back. Armed to the wires with an upgradable arsenal of guns and weapons, your job is to take back planet Earth, one bullet at a time.

name: Elden Ring: The Convergence
description: The Convergence mod is an exhaustive overhaul of Elden Ring with dozens of new weapons, hundreds of new spells, extensively revamped areas and maps, improved visuals, new enemies, bosses and much more.

name: Gateway II
description: The game has a very simple premise: guide the character through a series of rooms. Solve puzzles to advance.

name: Atonement
description:
A collection of 33 new levels for Doom II, ranging from sprawling shootouts to claustrophobic challenge maps.

Designed for both single player and cooperative modes.

There's one brand new enemy, and a new final boss, but otherwise the gameplay is just like Classic Doom.

name: Akeldama
description: Get ready to blaze through 32 action-packed levels fit to play in any port of choice - echoes of past megawad affairs such as Memento Mori and Alien Vendetta helped to shape the inspiration for this project. Akeldama continues in the spirit of collecting a group of talented mappers and creating a brand new experience for regular doom2.exe.

name: The Mapwich
description: The Mapwich is a collaborative megawad for Doom II, first released on June 2019. The project was led by Bridgeburner56 and based around the idea of pairing up mappers for each of the levels in the set, but also having the pairs be randomly chosen: the result was a total of 30 mappers, for 15 regular maps + 1 hub map. Each mapper was given free reign on what to build and what settings to utilize, the only rules being that the project had to be tested in GZDoom and that only a handful of liquid fall textures and new skies would be used as far as new graphics go, with everything else being stock Doom 1 and Doom 2 assets.

name: The Mapwich 2: The Mapwichening
description: The Mapwich 2 is a collaborative megawad for Doom II, first released on October 2020. A sequel to the previous year's The Mapwich, the project was led by Bridgeburner56 and was once again based around the idea of pairing up mappers for each of the levels in the set, but also having the pairs be randomly chosen: the result was contributions of 45 mappers, for a total of 22 maps. Unlike its predecessor, Mapwich 2 is built with the OTEX texture pack by ukiro and integrates the gameplay changes of the Supercharge mod by Tango.

name: Intergalactic Xenology Trilogy
description: These maps are intended for Boom compatible, UMAPINFO enabled ports. This trilogy combines enhanced versions o﻿f the first two episodes of the series with some new maps that make up the third episode. We used UMAPINFO to create an episodic structure (with new story text at the end of each episode!), so a port that supports the format will need to be used to play.

name: Crud
description: CRUD is a four-level Doom II miniwad featuring short, simple maps that start out easy but get significantly harder by the end. I would liken the last map's difficulty to late-TNT, early-Plutonia. Each map uses only stock textures, and the whole wad can be finished in about 15 minutes or so.

name: Run or Die
description: Embark on an adventure across multiple worlds in this dynamic 3D platformer! Utilize the BunnyHOP ability to leap through obstacles, face unique challenges, and uncover hidden secrets. Fun and excitement are guaranteed with every jump!

name: Puzzle Valley
description: Puzzle Valley is a puzzle game which is set in a small and peaceful world. The goal is to explore this world and discover new puzzles and some hints to solve them.

name: A One Rabbit Open Slay
description:
A One Rabbit Open Slay is a single Boom map for Doom 2 (MAP01) using the OTEX texture pack as a base. The wad does utilize UMAPINFO, so you will need to run it in a port that supports the format. MAPINFO and a few other enhancements were made for GZDoom as well, so that can also be used. PrBoom+ UM, Woof!, DSDA Doom, and GZDoom were used for testing.

The main objective here is slightly different in that you need to deliver presents to three Christmas trees located throughout the map. Press the "use" key next to one of these trees to drop off the gifts. Once they have all been delivered, return to your sleigh!

name: Matriarchy Attack
description: Pixel woman character game, you are figthing with abnormal enemies. dystopian platform based story game.

name: Greatest Dynasties Mahjong
description: The greatest dynasties played this game! From emperors to common people honed their minds through this game. And who knows, maybe that was the key to their success?!

name: Bum Ball Bears
description: Try to bump the ball past the opposing team.

name: Atrophy
description: Atrophy is a boom-compatible map which heavily focuses on atmosphere and exploration. It takes around 30 minutes to beat on first playthrough. Difficulty-wise it should be accessible to most players who've played pwads before, although it can kill you if you're not careful.

name: D Pistols
description:
D Pistols is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly moving up and down. You goal is to shoot all the enemies that are coming from the sides of the screen. When the enemies reach the middle of the screen they will go up or down depending on your current position. Press a button to change your direction and shoot sideways. Hold a button to charge and shoot in all four directions.

The game is over when any enemy touches you.

name: Hidden Shapes: Cat Realm + Trick or Cats
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Hidden Shapes: Cat Realm + Trick or Cats, and experience the beauty of transforming shapes into mesmerizing art!

name: Arcade Archives: Mad Shark
description: Use a variety of power-up items to fight your way through the stages!

name: These Remains
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Racer 4: Rider Pack - The Truth
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Racer 4: Rider Pack - Space Dasher
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Racer 4: Rider Pack - Skewer
description: Sin descripción

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Hung Parliament
description:
Don your deerstalker and step into the shoes of the world’s most famous sleuth in this gripping 1-4 player mystery detective adventure.

With three cabinet members already murdered by hanging and Sherlock Holmes missing in action, it is up to you to find the killer before Big Ben strikes midnight. Interrogate suspects, analyse crime scenes, collect evidence, and enter your ‘Mind Palace’ to construct a compelling case in this ‘Whodunit’ that will push your deduction skills to their limits. Enjoy this narrative alone or with friends to make this a social sleuthing experience you will never forget.

Combining the worlds of immersive theatre and VR, Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Hung Parliament’ is a unique ‘evening-sized’ experience that you can enjoy again and again.

Please note: We are a small team and want to create the best possible experience, so any feedback you can share is appreciated. It will help us create an immersive and fun ‘Sherlock’ experience.

name: Another Adventure in NSMBU
description: It features four new worlds and a retextured world map, alongside custom music, tilesets, backgrounds, and much more.

name: The King of Fighters '96
description: A bootleg version of The King of Fighters '96, except it plays more like Street Fighter II.

name: It Only Gets Worse
description: It Only Gets Worse is a jokewad for Doom II and the ZDoom source port by Wills. It was uploaded to the /idgames archive on July 6, 2007, and received the Mockaward at that year's Cacowards.

name: Newdoom Community Project
description: Newdoom Community Project (aka NDCP) is a 2006 megawad that contains 32 new levels, made by members of the Newdoom community. It was one of the winners of Doomworld's Cacowards in 2006, and was followed by a sequel, NewDoom Community Project II, in 2009.

name: NewDoom Community Project II
description: NewDoom Community Project II (aka NDCP2) is a 2009 megawad that contains 32 new levels, made by members of the NewDoom community. It is a sequel to Newdoom Community Project, which was released in 2006.

name: Woodlawn: The End of the World
description:
When scientists try to create and control magic, their first spell goes wrong, and monsters are accidentally brought to life and destroy cities. Now the military has to hold off and contain the monsters while scientists try to figure out how to undo the spell.

The enemies AI can detect the skill of the player and automatically adjust difficulty based on player performance.

name: Nali Chronicles
description: Nali Chronicles is a single player mod for Unreal Tournament. In Nali Chronicles you play the part of a Nali Mage armed with various new weapons and capable of using powerful Nali spells. The mod includes, in addition to the weapons and spells, a completely new HUD and new pickups.

name: Unreal: Operation Na Pali
description: Operation Na Pali is a partial conversion for Unreal Tournament by Team Vortex. It - alongside Xidia - brought about a new era of Single Player mapping with brand new textures and architecture styles that would influence many other mappers in years to come.

name: Xidia Gold
description: Xidia Gold is the expanded rerelease of Unreal Tournament's partial conversion mod Xidia. The original episode was renamed to Xidia: The Incident and the follow up was named Xidia: The Escape.

name: Killing Adventure
description: Killing Adventure is a jokewad for Doom II and the ZDoom source port by Ruba. It was uploaded to the /idgames archive on September 5, 2009, and received the Mockaward at that year's Cacowards. A sequel, Killing Adventure 2, was released in 2016.

name: Khorus' Speedy Shit
description: Khorus' Speedy Shit is a 2011 megawad by Adam Woodmansey (Khorus) consisting of 32 speedmaps built in around 26 days. The secret levels were contributed by guest editors Brian Knox (Snakes) and Tango. It was uploaded on the /idgames archive on 11th November 2011, and was one of the recipients of the 18th Annual Cacowards.

name: Twin Peaks: Into the Night
description: Created as an hommage to good old 90s game classics, Twin Peaks: Into the Night is a fan game adaptation of the eponymous series created by Mark Frost and David Lynch.

name: Feed Me
description: Bite the environment and drag yourself through the green house.

name: Hexanaut.io
description: 3D multiplayer io game: capture hexagons by enclosing territory and become the king! Seize totems for extra powers. Wait for time-out or kill all enemies like a battle royale.

name: Fappy Bird
description: Fappy Bird has discovered the internet, help him avoid detection by mom and furiously tap his way to joy! Don't get caught!

name: Super Emma
description: Play as Emma through 10 levels and help her on her quest to save Mario.

name: Jubeat Beyond the Ave.
description: Upgraded version of Jubeat Ave.

name: Himitsu Kessha Q
description: A PS1 tactical RPG.

name: Hikidashi Aita
description: A sanrio mobile game.

name: Hidden Object: Detective Agency the Crime of Lord
description: Save yourself and humanity! It’s 1960s England and there's a beautiful 3-floor mansion in the shade of branchy trees. You've travelled for days to reach a castle hidden deep. With a friendly landlord and inexpensive rent, most people would envy those who live here. But bloody things are happening inside of this house. Guests are beheaded, and with every new victim humankind is getting closer to meeting a horrible monster. Is there anyone to prevent this nightmare?

name: Pizza Maker Game
description:
Try out a brand new cooking game for kids! A pizza game which is funny and educational game! In Pizza Maker Games the kids learn to make pizza in the Cooking Academy!
Did you hear? The masterchef is in town! Here comes the master pizza maker now. It looks like he is troubled…could it be that he is looking for a new cooking assistant? I wonder who will have the honor of working along with such a great cook master. It could be anyone. Well, what are you waiting for? Wake up the pizza master inside you! Hurry up, and download one of the best cooking games there is! It’s pizza time people!
But beware! If you want to become the new master pizza chef you will have to be extra observant and imaginative! In this one of a kind pizza maker games you must remember all the ingredients that the mastercook used on his pizza. Your task is to make pizzas similar to the ones pizza cook made. Enter the Kitchen and make the best pizza with a simple pizza dough recipe. Then use the picture at the top of the screen as your pizza recipe and try to find the ingredients you need in the pizza cookbook. Put as many ingredients as you want and make pizza just by clicking on the pizza dough. When your pizza is ready to be cooked just click on the button in the bottom right corner and your work of art is already in the pizza oven! But don’t get too comfortable, because if you are not quick enough to put it out of the oven, your pizza can be ruined! Learn how to make pizza and have fun playing one of the pizza games!

name: War Strategy
description: Sin descripción

name: Chilly Slide
description:
You can slide, slalom and dash down on skis, snowboards or snow sleds. You can race, chill and meet a bunch of colorful characters!
It’s a whole new chapter of the Geometry Slalom Saga. It’s a Winter Sports Wonderland. Play with one simple game mechanic, experience the game’s “no-frills” infinite variety and enjoy your journey downhill!

name: Creepy Clown Zombie Slayer VR
description:
Use your virtual reality headset to experience the thrill of fighting a horde of zombies from the comfort of your own home!
Get ready to defend from zombies in virtual reality! Experience the real sensation and thrill of the undead with your mobile virtual reality headset. Look in the direction you want to shoot your gun and don't get bitten by zombies!

name: Slaughter: The Lost Outpost
description:
Return to the world of Slaughter, a gloomy place where anarchy and lawlessness reign. Reckless bandits and thugs have broken free from a massive prison, forming gangs and engaging in fierce battles to gain control over the territory.
Our hero - Russell, found himself in the very middle of this chaos and is trying to survive at any cost. He is destined for the fate of a slave if he does not find a way to get out of prison.
Russell has to arm himself and carve his way to freedom. Along the journey, the player, alongside the main character, will discover what is unfolding in this strange place — encountering allies and unraveling the dark secrets concealed within the vast complex's walls.
Fate has tossed you right into the turf of the deadliest and savage thugs. Well, it's too bad for those sorry bastards. Arm yourself, soldier, and rid this hornet's nest. Zero tolerance for those scumbags - there will be enough bullets for everyone.
Explore the vast complex, discover detours, find weapons and upgrade equipment, study documents and diaries that shed light on what is happening around.

name: Scrumpit
description: Scrumpit is a scrabble / crossword style board game for 2, 3 or 4 players, involving tactics, strategy and wordplay with the option of scoring for yourself and/or frustrating other players by stealing their letters.

name: Resident Evil 0: Complete Costume Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: The Cognition Engine
description:
"The Cognition Engine" is a single Doom 2 map for limit-removing ports. The map is somewhat exploration-focused, takes roughly 25-35 minutes to beat (depending on difficulty and how thorough you are with said exploration).

Difficulties are implemented, UV starts off pretty easy but has a few tough fights near the end, though the difficulty may vary greatly depending on the amount exploration and secret hunting the player does. Because of that, and since the map is fairly lenghty, I recommend saving a few times. Expect HNTR and HMP to be on a significantly easier side.

name: Akashic Migraine
description:
"Akashic Migraine" is a misshapen, awkward, and unfriendly map i put together as a break from work on time tripper. it's exhausting making detailed, pretty, and generally accessible things all the time, especially when my tastes lean the other way.

there's a reasonable amo﻿unt of platforming (all of it can be done with running once you work out the angles, don't feel bad about taking it slow or savescumming those bits though) and the combat ramps up quickly from "this is kind of awkward" to "this is kind of awkward light slaughter". generally speaking i configured it to be just enough of a challenge to me.

name: Irkalla
description: This 11-map set is a pseudo-reimagining of Doom I Episode 3: Inferno, except in Doom II and using Boom features and expanded limits. It should work in anything that can handle the equivalent of complevel-9. Expectations may be subverted, and there should be some surprises along the way!

name: Amorphous Euphoria
description: Amorphous Euphoria is a random, chaotic, and artsy Doom project with plenty to admire and varied challenges to overcome. Amorphous Euphoria is also Doom Universe's first original community project.

name: Morior Invictus
description: Morior Invictus is a collaborative megawad for Doom II that contains 33 levels, made by the members of the Doomworld community, lead by forgettable pyromaniac. The project's goal was to emulate mapping tendencies of the 90's, but with a more modern approach

name: Beat Survival: Expansion
description: If you enjoy playing Beat Survival in Early Access and want to continue playing with extension map and additional 9 NPC's missions, then please buy this DLC-Expansion In this DLC, the map becomes double size for you or with other player to explore than in Early Access. More stories are more fun.

name: Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends
description: A cancelled NES port for Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends.

name: Hentai Pussy 7
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Slime Climb Scrum
description: If mutual harm is a human instinct, then we want to magnify it infinitely! Slime Climb Scrum can sprinkle a specks of darkness onto you (your) wonderful life! A 2D vertical-axis, high-difficulty jumping game that supports multiplayer cooperation and challenge modes!

name: Hexceed: Ventus Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Ventus Puzzle your way through 111 new levels - All levels include the brand new "Donut" mechanic!

name: Quicksand
description: Quicksand is a hardcore third-person shooter game that takes you on a thrilling journey through the heart of the Middle East with 26 well designed levels. Set in a war-torn region, the game combines intense action, strategic gameplay, and a gripping storyline to create an unforgettable experience.

name: Cyber Space Driver
description: This is First Person, Endless Driving game in CyberPunk setting.You can choose any of (4) CyberPunk style maps, Upload your own music, songs, tracks to the Game Radio. Through your way, you be able to see Different, Random, CyberPunk Events.

name: CyTale
description: Cytale is an immersive fantasy multiplayer online game that revolves around a rich lore featuring dragons, adventurers, and the battle against dark forces. Set in a world where dragons were once revered rulers, players embark on quests and challenges to overcome the aftermath of their withdrawal, leading to a world filled with danger and dark magic. The game combines elements of adventure, fantasy, and strategy genres. Its unique features include a captivating storyline, dynamic multiplayer interactions, and a focus on fostering a strong player community. With a seamless blend of exploration, combat, and teamwork, Cytale offers players a chance to engage in an epic journey of cooperation and heroism.

name: 200V Mahjong Challenge Spirits
description: Sin descripción

name: 3-pun Tenkatouitsu: Bakumatsu Quiz-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: The Princess and the Rose Knight
description:
Short yuri-themed RPG Maker game created by rpgex/En. The player controls Galatea, commander of the newly established princess guard,on her adventures trying to protect the adventure-loving princess of Laomedia. The player must explore various dungeons and partake in turn-based combat to defeat enemies.

While the in-dungeon gameplay is fairly similar to most traditional console RPGs (although, the game does feature a SaGa-inspired glimmer system for unlocking new abilities mid-combat), while in the castle, the player can also interact with a variety of characters and flirt with all the cute girls around! The game keeps track of how "yuri" the player's responses to the different characters are via a yuri gauge, a fun play on the typical alignment gauge found in other RPGs.

name: 3-pun Tenkatouitsu: Higashinippon Sengoku Quiz-hen

name: The Space Brigade: Space Raiders - Refueled
description:
Classic-Arcade Styled Space Shooter, Fast Paced, Simple Gameplay.

The game is intended for short sessions, as it's more of an infinite shooter rather than a complex experience.

The game is available for Microsoft Windows and Android in it's complete state with updates from time to time.

name: Mystic Messenger: Rika's Behind Story
description: DLC released along with V's After Ending centered around Rika's tortured childhood and what went into making her the way she is. Consists of eight episodes and no chatrooms.

name: Molecano
description: Molecano is an all-new word puzzle game from the creator of Dadish! Help Molene the mole explore volcanoes using words as a bridge. String words together so Molene can cross safely and collect all the delicious food strewn across the lava loaded levels.

name: 5 Differences
description: Can you spot the 5 differences?

name: Meimou Halloween
description: It's October 31st, meaning it's Halloween! So I carved a pumpkin and then the damn thing started to talk. And it claims to be the devil, lol. Also, "Trick or Treat!" Time to make him go away with treats.

name: Ograidet
description:
My best friend 'killed herself'.
She didn't leave a suicide note. And yet, they concluded that's exactly the way her life ended.
She was a downer and had few friends.
But she did have a stalker. I'm sure he killed her. To prove the truth, I started my own investigation.

name: On the Island of Falling Stars: Chapter 1
description:
As another hazy summer begins on the small island of Cóiméad, strange rumors start to circulate about the end of the world. A few whispers accumulate; the sea runs red, and the rains continue.

The first chapter covers three friends' search for the source of these rumors and what truth they may hold.

name: Your, Endless Mind. Glava I: My
description: Do you really want to know? You need to understand that there's no turning back. Here, every action you take has consequences. Do you think you know everything about yourself? I will prove to you, that that's not true. Are you ready? He's already waiting. Your, Endless Mind.

name: Jump Boy
description: Platform game for java cell phones in which you must make jumps through different maps using a scope in which we can choose the direction and power of the jump that was preinstalled in some old samsung cellphones.

name: 6 Differences
description:
Spot the 6 differences between the two panels.

Sequel to 5 differences. that one was about the day time, this one is about the night time.

name: Rally 3D
description: Racing game for java cellphones in wich you can select from three modes - Championship, Time Trial and Multiplayer over Bluetooth connection.

name: Rebels
description:
Hello !!!
Welcome to the Space Rebels game!
The goal of the game is to eliminate all of the enemy spaceships and BOSS at the end of each level.
This is a spaceships shooting java game that was in a motorola cell phone.

name: Diamonds Mine
description:
Arrakis Software's take on Boulder Dash, released on the Amiga in Poland.

The game has settings for difficulty and the number of starting lives. Some levels require specific use of new tools they added to the format while others challenge your reaction time, made harder by the screen scrolling slower than the you can move, as you attempt to evade enemies and hazards while collecting the required number of diamonds before reaching the exit.
There may have been a level editing program available from Arrakis as well.

name: The Singularity Complex
description: Singularity Complex is an episode of 9 levels for Ultimate Doom, done in the "classic" Doom style. It is the successor of the much acclaimed Classic Episode, so I guess you could also call it Classic Episode 2.

name: Endless Truck
description: Go on an endless truck ride in this fun driving game! Complete missions at each level. Collect money to buy upgrades. You can earn extra money by performing cool stunts. If you get a perfect landing you get a huge speed boost so aim for those as well. Keep going as long as you don't run out of fuel!

name: Quake II
description: You are humanity's last hope to stop the Strogg, a hostile alien race waging war against Earth. Play this military sci-fi FPS, now upgraded for modern platforms with improved visuals, new campaign content, online multiplayer/co-op, and more.

name: The King of Fighters XIII: Global Match
description: An updated rerelease of The King of Fighters XIII, featuring rollback netcode and expanded online lobby features.

name: Excit
description:
Excit is the best safe for workspace puzzle game ever. You're trapped in a spreadsheet and you need to escape the 30 levels using the cursor keys without sliding of the screen.

Excit was created in the year 2005 as a viral marketing game for the German business software company MIS AG. In 2007, after the company dissolved, the game was released on the Internet for the first time.

name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Day Zero Edition
description: This Day Zero Edition features two custom weapons, the AK-12G Assault Rifle and Crossbow-B2. Finally, the Day Zero Edition also includes the Advanced Arsenal Bullet Brass exoskeleton and EM1 Quantum directed energy weapon. Play before the rest of the world with the Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Day Zero Edition.

name: Coloring Pixels: R/Place 2023 Pack
description: This Free book unlocks additional levels for Coloring Pixels! As a thank you to our community for getting our logo into the r/place board this year multiple times, we have put together a free DLC of all the various Toastielabs logos we managed to get throughout the whole event.

name: Midnight Witch Starlight
description: A 90s anime inspired, wave based, 2D run and gun side scroller, where you are a magical girl on the side of light. Load out your arsenal of spells to free the legion of spirits corrupted by the legion of shadow.

name: Lucky Bastard
description: Girls and MILFs will meet MCs along the way. Every choice counts. What awaits the MC in the finale? Maybe a harem, or maybe true love?

name: Sex Simulator: CamGirl Audition
description: A sex simulation game with visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a guy who is looking for models for his video chat studio.

name: Summer Party Time: Survival Pack
description: The Summer Party is getting even bigger! Here come four new minigames! The Survival Pack downloadable content for Summer Party Time has arrived! Keep the party going with these four new minigames!

name: Train Sim World 3: Norfolk Southern Heritage Livery Collection Add-On
description: Celebrate the history of US rail with this stunning mix of Fallen Flag schemes, haul freight in colorful style with the NS Heritage Livery Collection for Train Sim World 3, which depicts 9 liveries carried by a fleet of Norfolk Southern's ES44AC locomotives.

name: Monculi
description: 9 little men slapping on eachother.

name: Revolution: The New Cycle
description: Tap your way up through each spinning ring avoiding red to gain a point. Oh, and don't wait too long or the walls will crush you! You will need fast reactions and nerves of steel! How far can you go?

name: Car Park: Draw Lines Puzzle
description: Your goal is to park your car in a safe location without hitting other cars or obstacles. You can guide your vehicles to the parking spot by drawing a line with your finger. However, some parking spaces are crowded and difficult to navigate, so plan your moves carefully.

name: Revolution 3
description: The reboot to the classic game has arrived! Revolution³ is a tribute to the classic mobile games of the past, no microtransactions or loot boxes. Just simple, honest-to-goodness fun.

name: Last Pocket
description:
"Welcome to the thrilling world of "Last Pocket," where your strategic prowess and quick thinking will be put to the ultimate test! Arrange the wooden planks with a tap, creating a maze of reflections and angles to guide the ball towards victory. Ten distinct elements add a twist to every level, keeping you on your toes and your mind engaged.
Are you ready to take on this pocket puzzler and immerse yourself in the world of "Last Pocket"?

name: Jackpot Words
description: Create the right word combos and win huge payouts. The more coins you win, the higher you rise!
